translation.lb: Fir neischt.
translation.en: For nothing.

translation.lb: D'Koh muss aus dem Stall, éch gin net mé drân.
translation.en: The cow has to leave the stable, I won't go in anymore.

translation.lb: Dât hûot dén ârme Méchel schons fir d'dausenstmol missen héere fun sénger Prâ.
translation.en: That's what poor Michel has had to hear for the thousandth time from his wife.

translation.lb: E wosst et jo ganz gut, séng „Blèss" wor âl, schon zenter lang hûot se kèng Melléch mé gin, an ail Dâg ass se mé môer gin.
translation.en: He knew very well that his 'Blèss' was old, for a long time it hasn't given any milk, and each day it's going downhill.

translation.lb: Endléch, en hât dès Spetakel genoch, höllt en se an de Strack an e féert se op den Ettelbrécker Mârt; mè emesoss, kê wollt em s'ofkâfen, kê Jud a kê Krescht.
translation.en: Finally, he had enough of the spectacle, puts her in the leash and drives her to the Ettelbruck market; but in vain, no Jew or Christian wanted to buy her.

translation.lb: An de Mârt war eriwer, an hién hât séng Blèss nach.
translation.en: And the market was over, and he still had his Blèss.

translation.lb: Traurég gong en hêm.
translation.en: Sadly he went home.

translation.lb: Ennerwé kent nach den Hènnes bei en.
translation.en: On the way, Hennes still comes to him.

translation.lb: Dém klot e nun sei Lêd: Kuckt Hènnes, eist Lies, dir wesst jo, esö gut wé et ass, esö béss kann et och gin; et ass em Stand et schlét méch döt, wann éch mat dém ferwenschte Yéh hêm kommen.
translation.en: To him he now laments his sorrow: Look, Hennes, our trouble, you know, as good as it is, it can also be bad; it's likely it will kill me if I come home with this cursed beast.

translation.lb: E' lamentéert nach, du spréngt èng Mök iwert de Wé: Hènnes, jeitzt de Méchel, wanns du de Mök do fröss, da kriss de méng Köh!
translation.en: He's still lamenting, when a frog hops across the road: Hennes, shouts Michel, if you eat that frog, you'll get my cow!

translation.lb: Den Hènnes spréngt dur, ergreift d'Mök a beisst de Kapp erôf.
translation.en: Hennes jumps over, grabs the frog and bites its head off.

translation.lb: Mais den Appetit lésst e bâl am Stéch.
translation.en: But his appetite soon leaves him in the lurch.

translation.lb: Kuck Méchel, mèngt en, wanns du de Rèscht elo éss, da krisst du déng Köh erem.
translation.en: Look Michel, he says, if you eat the rest now, you'll get your cow back.

translation.lb: De Méchel hât schons Angscht kriet, wé den Hènnes esö séer zögebasst hât, en hât schons hirt Lies gesin op hién dursprangen.
translation.en: Michel was already frightened when Hennes bit so fiercely, he had already seen his trouble jumping at him.

translation.lb: Durfir höllt hién elo den Hènnes beim Wûort, an e wirgt an e wirgt biss en dé âner Halschécht fun der Mök am Mô hât.
translation.en: So he now holds Hennes to his word, and he struggles and struggles until he has the other half of the frog in his mouth.

translation.lb: Rôhég, öne e Wûort ze schwètzen, gin se firun, de Méchel hât jo séng Köh erem.
translation.en: Calmly, without saying a word, they go on, Michel has his cow back.

translation.lb: Endléch bleiwt de Méchel stoen, hie kuckt den Hènnes mat grossen Aen un, a sét: Hènnes, fir wât hu mer eigentléch dé Mök gefriéss?
translation.en: Finally Michel stops, looks at Hennes with big eyes, and says: Hennes, why did we actually eat the frog?

translation.lb: Politesch prozesser Cornelius Ehr, schmelzarbechter, Sehëffleng, go'f zu 3 me'nt prisong an 1000 fr. bo'ss verurtélt, well e b'iockleiter vun der DdB wor.
translation.en: In the political trial, Cornelius Ehr, a metalworker from Schifflange, was sentenced to 3 months in prison and fined 1000 francs because he was a block leader of the DdB.

translation.lb: Vun dénen anere beschrllegongen go'f e freigesprach.
translation.en: He was acquitted of the other charges.

translation.lb: Nie. Jacoby, commerçant, Letzeburg, press- a propagandawalter vun der DAF an an der NSDAP, go'f zu 8 joer prisong an 10 000 frang strof verurtélt.
translation.en: Nie. Jacoby, a businessman from Luxembourg, a press and propaganda officer of the DAF and a member of the NSDAP, was sentenced to 8 years in prison and fined 10,000 francs.

translation.lb: Vun denen anere beschëllegongen go'f hié freigesprach.
translation.en: He was acquitted of the other charges.

translation.lb: Ernst Kielhorn, techniker, Letzeburg, iwerfe'ert, kassewalter vun der DAF, blockhelfer an Zellenleiter vun der VdB an an der NSDAP gewiéscht ze sin an sech eng denunziatio'n zu schelle komme geiöss ze hun go'f zu 10 joer züchthaus an 10000 frang bo'sa vcrurtélt.
translation.en: Ernst Kielhorn, a technician from Luxembourg, was accused of being a treasurer of the DAF, a block helper and cell leader of the VdB and NSDAP, and for facilitating a denunciation, was sentenced to 10 years in a penal house and fined 10,000 francs.

translation.lb: E verle'ert d'letzeburgesch nationalite't.
translation.en: He loses his Luxembourg nationality.

translation.lb: De stémetzer Nie. Reiter vu Koplescht krut 2 joer prisong a 6000 fr. strof, well en an der NSDAP wor an de pompjéen befuel huet „Heil Hitler" ze man.
translation.en: The stonemason Nie. Reiter from Kopstal was sentenced to 2 years in prison and fined 6,000 francs because he was in the NSDAP and commanded the firefighters to say 'Heil Hitler'.

translation.lb: lleinrech Greisch vun De'fferdcng, stémetzer, hât d'uniform vun der NSKK gedroen a wor an deser organisation.
translation.en: Heinrich Greisch from Differdange, a stonemason, wore the NSKK uniform and was in this organization.

translation.lb: E go'f zu 9 me'nt prisong verurtélt.
translation.en: He was sentenced to 9 months in prison.

translation.lb: De werkschutzmann J. H. Thill, Esch-Alz., zellenleiter vun der NSV, blockwalter vum WHW, wor an der NSDAP an huet sech eng dénunziatio'n zu schelle komme geiöss, go'f zu 7 joer zûchthaus verurtélt, an d'letzeburgesch nationalite't go'f him entzun.
translation.en: The factory security officer J. H. Thill, from Esch-Alzette, a cell leader of the NSV and block warden of the WHW, was in the NSDAP and facilitated a denunciation, was sentenced to 7 years in a penal house, and his Luxembourg nationality was revoked.

translation.lb: Lucion Jakob, employé, De'fferdeng, iwerfe'ert ortspresse-, ortsgruppenleiter a ratsherr gewiéscht ze sin, go'f zu 4 jor prisong a 50 000 frang verurtélt.
translation.en: Lucion Jakob, an employee from Differdange, was accused of being a local press, local group leader, and councilman, was sentenced to 4 years in prison and fined 50,000 francs.

translation.lb: Leo Wagner, techniker, Béteburg, mitglied vun der NSDAP, bildstellenleiter vun der VdB, op den Hitler verédegt an u wehrmachtbetreuong délgeholl, go'f zu 5 joer prisong a 15000 frang bo'ss verurdélt.
translation.en: Leo Wagner, a technician from Bettembourg, a member of the NSDAP, director of the education department of the VdB, defended Hitler and participated in Wehrmacht support, was sentenced to 5 years in prison and fined 15,000 francs.

translation.lb: Willibald Taschler, ustreicher, vu Biéles, wor rottenführer an der NSKK a betriebsobmann, en huet d'NSKKuniform an eng waff gedroen so we' Propaganda gemâcb, hié go'f zu 10 jor zûchthaus vcrurtélt, e verle'ert d'letzeburgesch nationalite't.
translation.en: Willibald Taschler, a painter from Bieles, was a squad leader in the NSKK and a works representative, wore the NSKK uniform and carried a weapon while spreading propaganda, he was sentenced to 10 years in a penal house and loses his Luxembourg nationality.

translation.en: Within 5 years, the population increased by over 8 million.

translation.en: At this rate, America will have 200 million after 25 years.

translation.lb: D’Liberatio’n vu Pareis De 24. august 44 h net d'ganz weit voîler spannong de franse'sehe Tadio gelauschtert, dé fix d'e'scht vun der diberatio'n vu Pareis geschwat huet.
translation.en: On August 24, 1944, the whole world listened with tension to the French radio, which first spoke of the liberation of Paris.

translation.lb: Nach si a d'preisesch panzer an de strôsse patrouille'ert, nach hât d'SS hire oommandoposlo net verlôss, nach huet de militärbefehlshaber von Cboltitz d'befehler aus dem F ühre rhau p t qua rt ie r kritt a schon hât d'pareisser populatio'n sech matt engem énzegartege coup erhuewen.
translation.en: Still, Prussian tanks patrolled the streets, the SS had not yet abandoned their command posts, and the military commander von Choltiz was still receiving orders from the Führer's headquarters, yet the Parisian population had risen with a unique coup.

translation.lb: De radio wor an der hand vun der gro'sser FFlarme'.
translation.en: The radio was in the hands of the great FFlarme'.

translation.lb: Den dag virdrun hât de generol Eisenhower der divisio'n Leclerc d'erlabnes gin, de marsch op PaTcis opzehuelen, a gieichzeiteg huet sech d'immens heeresgrupp Bradley no Osten a bewegong gesat.
translation.en: The day before, General Eisenhower had given the division Leclerc permission to march towards Paris, and simultaneously, the immense Bradley army group began moving east.

translation.lb: Get Pareis a strôsseJcâmpf zerste'ert? Dat huet d'ganz civilise'ert weit sech gefrot.
translation.en: Will Paris be destroyed in street fighting? This is what the entire civilized world was asking.

translation.lb: De 25. august ass an engem onbeschreiwleche jubel d'divisio'n Leclerc an d'stad ageréckt an huet de" verénzelt kämpfend preisesch gruppen opgeriwen.
translation.en: On August 25, with indescribable jubilation, the Leclerc division entered the city and broke up the isolated fighting Prussian groups.

translation.lb: Pareis wor libere'ert duerch eng wonneribar zesummenarbecht vun de Pareisser birger matt der franse'scher arme'<
translation.en: Paris was liberated through a wonderful collaboration between the Parisians and the French army.

translation.lb: Mir liate seiner geléenhét, ne' mer heim lèschten internationale congress vun <ler Resistenz zu Pareis waren, fiions de réduit op der Place Denfert- Rochereau unzekucken, vun dém aus de Colonel Rot, chef vun den F. F. I. de l'lle-de-France, d'insurrection vu Pareis dirige'ert huet.
translation.en: We had the opportunity, when at the last international congress of the Resistance in Paris, to visit the stronghold at Place Denfert-Rochereau, from where Colonel Rol, leader of the F. F. I. de l'Ile-de-France, directed the insurrection of Paris.

translation.lb: Den CNR hât eng intim feler organise'ert, fir de friénie gäscht op der plaz durch de Colonel Roi sel wer de venlaf vun den operatio'nen, de' zur liberatio'n vu Pareis gefo'ert huu, explizc'eren ze Jössen.
translation.en: The CNR had organized an intimate event to allow Colonel Rol to personally explain to the honored guests on site the course of operations that led to the liberation of Paris.

translation.lb: Bei deser geléenhét konnte mer perse'nlecbe contact ophueie matt de generél Le Gentilhomme a Joinville, de' selwer oc.h eso' villes zur befreiong vu Pareis bcigedToen hun, an et huet sech erausgeslallt, datt de' séchercher, de' îwer des liberatio'n verbrét gi sin, der wirklechkét net entspriéchen.
translation.en: On this occasion, we were able to establish personal contact with General Le Gentilhomme in Joinville, who had also contributed so much to the liberation of Paris, and it turned out that the certainties spread about this liberation did not correspond to reality.

translation.lb: Englesch fraen a kanner gin aus Palestina evacue’ert Jerusalem.,
translation.en: English women and children are evacuated from Palestine Jerusalem.

translation.en: — The High Commissioner for Palestine, General Allan Cunningham, announced that from February 4 onwards, English women and children will be evacuated from Palestine.

translation.lb: An der uerder béscht et:
translation.en: The order states:

translation.en: „Due to the current events in Palestine, it has been decided to evacuate the women and children of certain English civilians.

translation.en: so that the Palestinian government has a free hand maintained to keep order.

translation.en: The interested persons will receive an official announcement and will be given the necessary instructions.

translation.en: Preparations for this evacuation have already begun, with the police going door to door to register the English civilians.

translation.en: The military clubs and canteens in Jerusalem have been closed and the wives of military personnel must remain in their accommodations.

translation.en: Jerusalem. — Various English trading companies from Jerusalem and Haifa have sent a telegram to Prime Minister Attlee, energetically protesting against the order for English women and children to leave Palestine.

translation.en: After the evacuation order was issued, the American consul in Palestine asked his government for instructions.

translation.en: The evacuation order affects approximately 2000 families.

translation.en: All correspondents from English newspapers have been ordered to leave Palestine.

translation.en: If they still wish to stay, they do so at their own risk.

translation.en: On October 18, 1940, the resistance fighter Michel Schwindel gave a big patriotic speech at Café Hermes in De'ngen, during which he properly spoke the truth to various VdB men and protested against their Prussian stance.

translation.en: He managed to steal a diamond ring from a fallen soldier, and when that was not enough for him, he even severed the finger with the ring from the hand.

translation.lb: Beim Doktor.
translation.en: At the doctor.

translation.lb: De Klos fu' Strossen: „Bo schur, Här Dokter! éch kommen 'lo 'mol bei léch, fir dass Dir méch sollt ennersichen, éch wés net, wât éch hun, mei Leif ass net mé an der Uorder!"
translation.en: Klos from Strossen: "Well sure, Mr. Doctor! I'm coming to you now because I need you to examine me, I don't know what I have, my body is no longer in order!"

translation.lb: Den Dokter (nodém ass hién de Klos ronderem betâscht a visitéert liât): „Hern, hem, ma dât gléwen écli wûol! mein aie' Bèschten, Dir hûot lère Mo total ferbrannt!"
translation.en: The doctor (after feeling and examining Klos): "Hmm, hmm, I can believe that! My dear friend, you have a completely burned stomach!"

translation.lb: De Klos: „Wé, wât! Här Dokter, mei Mo ferbrannt? Jé, jé, git hängt èngem aneren dé Bier op, bei mir kommt Dir domat net nn!"
translation.en: Klos: "What, what! Doctor, my stomach burned? Yes, yes, save that beer for someone else, with me you're not getting anywhere with that!"

translation.lb: Den Dokter (eifrég): „An éch_ so'n léch nach' émoi, Dir hûot lère Mo total ferbrannt!"
translation.en: The doctor (enthusiastically): "And I'm telling you again, your stomach is completely burned!"

translation.lb: De Klos (kratzt séch hannert dem Oer): „Wann dât wierkléch de Fall ass, Här Dokter, da muss dât Onhélil mir am Drâm geschit sin!"
translation.en: Klos (scratching behind his ear): "If that's truly the case, Doctor, then that disaster must have happened to me in a dream!"

translation.lb: Den Dokter: „Wé so dann am Drâm?"
translation.en: The doctor: "How so, then, in a dream?"

translation.lb: De Klos: ~'Wèll écli, wann éch erwâoht war, emmer dûofir gesûorgt hun, dass mat Zeite' gelöscht ass gin!"
translation.en: Klos: "Because whenever I was awake, I always made sure things were extinguished in time!"

translation.lb: Den Dokter (schlét d'Hänn zesûomen): „Oh David, du Gottferllnchter David!" (Tableau).
translation.en: The doctor (clasping his hands): "Oh David, you godforsaken David!" (Tableau).

translation.lb: Zu Défferdang um Bour.
translation.en: At Déifferdeng in the neighborhood.

translation.lb: D'Schnarr: Wé hûot den Här gester den Hären emol d'Woerécht gesot!
translation.en: Schnarr: How the gentleman told the gentlemen the real truth yesterday!

translation.lb: D'Bärbel: Ja, an dât war nach läng net alles wât den Här gesot hat; gester Owend beim décke Jämpi hun se séch eréscht Sâche firgeworft dat ên séch muss fu Stécker lachen wann ên se héert.
translation.en: Bärbel: Yes, and that wasn't nearly everything the gentleman said; last night at fat Jämpi's, they accused each other of things that make you laugh out loud when you hear them.

translation.lb: D'Schnarr: Et hûot ê mer erziélt dén do war, et war esö sché' gewiést, wé de Fils gefrot hätt op 450 Frang dann net 3 [ze fill wär fir Kannermod a Privatcommissionaire, dât war scho' bal hinrêchend fir e Gemènge-Kannerasil ze enerhâlen.
translation.en: Schnarr: It was told to me by someone who was there, it was so nice when the son asked if 450 Francs weren’t too much for children's fashion and private commissions, that was almost enough to maintain a municipal children's asylum.

translation.lb: D'Bärbel: Ja, et 'ass schûod dat éch elo kèng klêng Kanner mé hun, éch géf s'och an den Asil dun fir s'opzezillen; en âner hât ower kê Gléck!
translation.en: Bärbel: Yes, it is a shame that I no longer have little children, I would put them in the asylum to educate them; another one wasn't so lucky!

translation.lb: D'Schnarr: Ja, mir âner müssen eîs fill geheie fir dé lidderéch Kèrelen ze erhâlen, a fun ail Kâbesblât Steiere bezûolen.
translation.en: Schnarr: Yes, we others must sacrifice a lot to maintain those useless boys, and pay taxes from every cabbage patch.

translation.lb: D'Bärbel: Ja, an dé ganze Buték ass kên Dahler wèrth!
translation.en: Bärbel: Yes, and the whole business isn't worth a dollar!

translation.lb: De Jongergesell. (Betrachtongen fun èngem âle Bettendorfer.)
translation.en: The Bachelor. (Reflections from an old man from Bettendorf.)

translation.lb: Ech sin nun haut én âlen Dapp, Dât weise' meng gro Hör um Kapp;
translation.en: I'm now an old fool today, as my gray hair on my head shows;

translation.lb: Siéchzég Jôr sin ech haut âl, An d'get an d'Grâf mat mir nu bâl.
translation.en: I'm sixty years old today, and soon I will go to the grave.

translation.lb: Haut setzen eoh eleng elei, An denken u' meng Dommerei;
translation.en: Today I sit here all alone, and think of my foolishness;

translation.lb: Hètt ech bestûod méch an der Zeit, Da' war ech haut nach net 'so weit,
translation.en: If I had settled down back in the day, I wouldn't be in this position today,

translation.lb: Meng Komeroten allegûoren, Mat hirer Frâ spazéere' fûoren;
translation.en: All my friends went walking with their wives,

translation.lb: Si nènne méch en âle Géck, Si hun eng Frâ, an éch en...
translation.en: They call me an old fool, they have a wife, and I have a...

translation.lb: Eeh hètt wûol dak e' Médche krit, Dir wesst éch war io kémol blid;
translation.en: Once, I could have had a girl, you know I was quite shy then;

translation.lb: Mais kémol, hun ech jo engt fond, Dem éch gerécht hètt d'Hand zum Bond.
translation.en: But once, I found someone to whom I could have pledged my hand.

translation.lb: Dât alleréscht dât ■ éch hât fond, Dât hât kén Zand mé an dem Mond;
translation.en: The very first one I found, she had no teeth in her mouth anymore;

translation.lb: Hètt éch em kâft en neit Gebess, Da' wir et gud gewiéscht, gewess.
translation.en: If I had bought her new dentures, it would surely have been good.

translation.lb: Dât zwét dât war eng empég Popp, Schûod, d'hât kén Hôr mé op der Kopp;
translation.en: The second one was a proud doll, alas, she had no hair left on her head;

translation.lb: Et hètt gebraucht nach eng Parék, Nu jé, éch hât och gûor ke Gléck!
translation.en: She needed a wig, oh well, I really had no luck!

translation.lb: 'So hat. éch iw'ral auszesetzen, Wât séch ganz gut hätt losst ersetzen;
translation.en: Wherever I thought of finding a fit, I found nothing to satisfy;

translation.lb: Duorfir sin éch nun haut elèng, Eng Frâ, dèr krè'n éch sei Liewe kèng.
translation.en: Therefore, I am alone today, a wife I'll never have in my life.

translation.lb: Op der Plessdarem.
translation.en: At the Place d'Armes.

translation.lb: Zwén Affekôten stin op der Plessdarem am Diskours, iwerdém kernt den Hèr Joris aus senger Rédaction eraus.
translation.en: Two lawyers stand at the Place d'Armes in conversation, when Mr. Joris comes out from his editorial office.

translation.lb: Den A (zum B): Kuck, do ass dé grosse Mann, dén secli em d'Letzeburger Litteratur esö gross Verdéngster erwürben hûot!
translation.en: A (to B): Look, there is the great man who has acquired such great merits for Luxembourg literature!

translation.lb: De B. (lacht): Ha, ha, ha! Ass dat well en „d'Gewessensbess" geschriven hûot?
translation.en: B (laughs): Ha, ha, ha! Is he the one who wrote 'the voice of conscience'?

translation.lb: Den A: Oh nén, au contraire, t'ass well en obgehâlen hûot mat letzeburger deitsch ze schrei wen.
translation.en: A: Oh no, on the contrary, he was prevented from writing in Luxembourgish German.

translation.lb: Zwêt Setzong fum Ackerbâuverein zu Bêtebureg.
translation.en: Second meeting of the Agricultural Association in Bettembourg.

translation.lb: Se setzen nêss zesûomen: Fir an der éschter Bänk de lânge Jang, d'Hô'r zu Bîreg stô'n ewé Fixspén, firun him séng mödesch Käppchen:
translation.en: They gather again: In the first row, long Jang, the hair standing stiff, in front of him his fashionable cap:

translation.lb: an der zwêter Bank, niéwent e pûor âner Mitglieder dé guden, âlen Nik, e râcht grâd de Stomp fun ènger Zigâre dé en séch e Freidéch ugefâng hât, an e flucht wèll en séch beim Ufènken de Schnauz gesengt hûot.
translation.en: in the second row, next to a few other members, the good old Nik, just lighting the end of a cigar that he had started on Friday, and he curses because he singed his mustache when lighting it.

translation.lb: De Jang: Milljess, wé sollen mer et am Verein mächen?
translation.en: De Jang: Milljess, what should we do in the association?

translation.lb: Solle mer ânescht stemmen?
translation.en: Should we vote differently?

translation.lb: Milljess, mer gi' geschwenn am „Letzeburger" esö rôse gemâcht dass mer et net mé auhâle' kénnen.
translation.en: Milljess, we will soon be so loudly spoken about in the "Letzeburger" that we cannot hold it anymore.

translation.lb: Milljess, éch lâfe bei jiderén an esö gûr bei d'Paschtéer, dass se solle Mitglied fum Verein gin, milljess, éch ferléere meng Plâtz ower net gir wént ménge Kanner.
translation.en: Milljess, I run to everyone and even to the pastor, that they should become members of the association, milljess, but I won't lose my place for my children.

translation.lb: De Nik: Du h... h... hûos R... R... Rècht.
translation.en: De Nik: You h... h... have R... R... Right.

translation.lb: De Jang: Wa Streit ass, da musse mer ofstemmen, milljess, mais éch muss beibehâle' gin, éch ferléere' méng sché Plâtz net gir, milljess.
translation.en: De Jang: If there is a dispute, then we have to vote, milljess, but I must be maintained, I won't lose my nice position.

translation.lb: De Nik: E... e... et get net o... o... ofgestemmt, e... e... et bleift wé et a... a... ass.
translation.en: De Nik: I... i... it will not be v... v... voted, i... it remains as it i... i... is.

translation.lb: De Jang: Milljess, éch schaffe nemmen dass de Verein soll firu' kommen, dir hûot et jo op dè'r lèschter Sté gesin, wö éch dat schént Sték Land kâft hun, (dât bellég wor) fir e Park unzelên dass éch ka'- mat den Hénger drâ furen, milljess.
translation.en: De Jang: Milljess, I only work so that the association can move forward, you saw it on the last fair, where I bought that beautiful piece of land, (that was cheap) to build a park where I can drive with the carts, milljess.

translation.lb: De Nik: E... e... éch muss m... m... méng Plâtz behâlen w... w... wann éch och m... m... misst mei' b..•. b... bèschte Gaul drem gin.
translation.en: De Nik: I... i... I must m... m... maintain my position e... e... even if I w... w... had to give up my b... b... best horse for it.

translation.lb: De Jang: Dé âner si rôssen, dass sie dé Plâtz net hun, durfir komme mir enuner an de „Letzeburger" stô'n, milljess.
translation.en: De Jang: The others are mad that they don't have the position, that's why we get to stand out in the "Letzeburger", milljess.

translation.lb: De Nik: Dé 5 oder 6 Z... Z... Zeitungsschreiwer, op dé mer supçonnéeren, können ewèch bleiwen, e... e... et sin d... d... der dach e... e... elauter dé ké Flapp M... M... Mescht firun der D... D... Dir hun.
translation.en: De Nik: Those 5 or 6 j... j... journalists, who are suspicious, can stay away, i... i... it is d... d... all those who have no manure to show at the door.

translation.lb: De Jang: Milljess, lôss mer 'mol kucken, allegur dé fir de Verein hàlen milljess, strecken de Fanger an d'Lucht, milljess!
translation.en: De Jang: Milljess, let us see, all those who hold for the association, raise your fingers in the air, milljess!

translation.lb: Wé en hèllescht Wiéder fûren 6 bis 7 Fangeren ewé Liéwerwurschten an d'Lucht, den Hâré hîft séng Fauscht, de Néckel dé mat dém geschwollene Bauch séng Schnaufbéks, de Flédert de lélebon, de Klènsehert dé grâd séng Jik aus dem Monn geholl hât, streckt dé aus, de Weissen séng zwö Hann, de Lauschterégen, dé grâd e Klûof ufênke wollt séng 2 Knéen, an den Hô'rkenstler, den op der Bank söss a lu Schrècken d'iwergewîcht ferléert trellt d'ennescht d'iéwescht a streckt d'Niederland an d'Lûcht.
translation.en: Like a bright storm 6 to 7 fingers point sausages in the air, the hairy lifts his fist, the Nick with the swollen belly his Snuffbox, the bat the bun, the little heart that just took his jig from the mouth stretches it out, the white his two hands, the listener, who just wanted to start a clove his 2 knees, and the artist, who sitting on the bench suddenly loses balance and stretches the upside-down Netherlands into the air.

translation.lb: Ailes mat enên: T'sin der genuch.
translation.en: All together: There are enough.

translation.lb: De Nik: Di... di... dir Hären an dir Damen, ê... é... éch si ganz geréert, e... e... elo hûole mer och e pu... pu... pûor Flèschen Hunyadi op d'Gesondhêt fum Verein.
translation.en: De Nik: G... g... gentlemen and ladies, I... I... am very moved, n... n... now we will also take a f... f... few bottles of Hunyadi for the health of the association.

translation.lb: De Godart (lûos zum Mètt): Kémen se alt elo bei méch, da kent éch och èppes gewannen!
translation.en: De Godart (quietly to himself): If they came to me now, I could win something too!

translation.lb: Kéhlen.
translation.en: Kehlen.

translation.lb: Wé et schéngt ass hei och ewèll èng Nötenschwänzmechergeschicht am Marsch, ass wé bei der Stàdt.
translation.en: It seems there is also a certain scandalous story here in the making, much like in the city.

translation.lb: Nu lauschtert gut:
translation.en: Now listen carefully:

translation.lb: Hei ass esö e klènge Beweis fun dêne pûor leschter Sonndécher.
translation.en: Here is a small piece of evidence from a few recent Sundays.

translation.lb: Gleich nom Mettegiéssen gêt et op êmol surn, sum, sum, an dann zit • dat sehént Gesehlècht séch no allen Gégenden hin, bal èng, oft och zwö Stonne weit ewèch dé âl Freieren opsichen.
translation.en: Right after lunch it goes all of a sudden ‘surn, sum, sum’, and then the pairs scatter in all directions, often seeking out old flames even one or two hours away.

translation.lb: Dàt sin esö Gêschter dé d'Schûoberfôer fun A bis Z dûrchgeklappt hun, an iéwer och all Kirmessen am Emkrêss.
translation.en: Those are the ghosts who have thoroughly participated in all festivities and every fair in the area.

translation.lb: Wé et schéngt féhlen si elo bei denen, dé sech op all dênen Fèstlechkêten mat hinen ameséert hun.
translation.en: It seems they are now missing those who enjoyed all those celebrations with them.

translation.lb: Ower bei wiém elo ufènken; t'kaseht emmer fill Kappbriéches.
translation.en: But where to start now is always a headache.

translation.lb: Wé et schéngt wellt elo kên mé èppes wessen fun der schéner Polka.
translation.en: It seems no one wants to know about the beautiful polka anymore.

translation.lb: Wann et esö firu gêt, sét de Franz, da get et och nach e wénég ze pintschen, soss trett kên an d'Fâl.
translation.en: If things continue this way, says Franz, there will still be a bit of pinching, otherwise no one will fall into the trap.

translation.lb: Um Dûorf.
translation.en: In the village.

translation.lb: Den Här Pascbtôer (zum Klos, dê besolfen iwer d'Gâss stîrkelt).
translation.en: The pastor (to Klaus, who drunkenly staggers across the street).

translation.lb: „Ower Klos, allt rem am Tubak! wéné hùos de dann am welles fir déch ze bekéeren?"
translation.en: "Oh Klaus, always back to the tobacco! When do you plan to reform yourself?"

translation.lb: De Klos. „Här Pa-pasehtöer, fi-fir méch ze bekéeren a-ass et nu-nun ze spét!"
translation.en: Klaus. "Mr. Pastor, for me to reform, it's now too late!"

translation.lb: Den Här Paschtôer. ~Nê, Klos, düofir ass et kêmol ze spét, de léwe Gott ferzeit emraer."
translation.en: The pastor. "No, Klaus, it is never too late for that, the dear God always forgives."

translation.lb: De Klos. „Wann dât de Fall ass, Här Pascbtôer, dann hun éch jo och na-nach Zeit ze wa-warden."
translation.en: Klaus. "If that is the case, Mr. Pastor, then I still have time to wait."

translation.lb: Op der Plassdârm.
translation.en: On the marketplace.

translation.lb: E Pàfendaller Fèchtbruder (zum Hèr Emil): Hèr Emil, schenkt mir e' wéneg G-héer!
translation.en: A Pafendall fencing brother (to Mr. Emil): Mr. Emil, give me a little favor!

translation.lb: Den Emil: Ferstin net'
translation.en: Emil: I don't understand you.

translation.lb: De Fèchtbruder (hallt d'Hand dûor): Schenkt mir e' weneg Gehéer!!!
translation.en: The fencing brother (holding out his hand): Give me a little favor!!!

translation.lb: Den Einil: Eçh ferstin déch nach net.
translation.en: Emil: I still don't understand you.

translation.lb: De Fechtbruder (jeitzt wât e' jeitze kann): Schhnkt mir e' wéneg Gehéer!!!
translation.en: The fencing brother (yelling as loud as he can): Give me a little favor!!!

translation.lb: Den Emil: Och, gé zum Deiwel! éch hu' sèlwer kênt!
translation.en: Emil: Oh, go to the devil! I know it myself!

translation.lb: (e schrékt d'Kûolegàss op.)

translation.en: The fencing brother (to himself): With all these people, I'm not making any progress this week!

translation.lb: Wéné ass Kirmessondég zu Letzeburg?
translation.en: When is Kirmes Sunday in Luxembourg?

translation.lb: Jo, wéné ass da Kirmessondeg zu Letzeburg? esd fret jiderê séch.
translation.en: Yes, when is Kirmes Sunday in Luxembourg? everyone is asking themselves.

translation.lb: Dé eng son t'wär de 29. August, dé âner de 5. September;
translation.en: Some say it would be the 29th of August, others the 5th of September;

translation.lb: t'sin esô gùor Kalènnern, dé den 5. September tir Kirmessondeg an de grosse Véhmàrt dèn emmer Kirmesméndeg gehàle get, fir de 30. August ugin.
translation.en: there are calendars that list the 5th of September as Kirmes Sunday and the large market that is always held on Kirmes Monday starting from August 30.

translation.lb: Wéné bâcke mer nun de Kuch, dir Damen?
translation.en: When do we bake the cake, ladies?

translation.lb: gelt, t'wèss kê Mensch et.
translation.en: Really, no one knows.

translation.lb: Abê, da lauschtert: de 5. September ass Kirmessondeg: a wuofir?
translation.en: But listen: the 5th of September is Kirmes Sunday: and why?

translation.lb: desen Tàg ass den éschte Sondeg am Mond, a fällt grad no Monaco-Empfàngniss, an dût ass de wichtesten a schénsten Dàg fir all Beamten an en général fir jidderèn.
translation.en: This day is the first Sunday of the month, and falls right after Monaco's reception, and that is the most important and beautiful day for all officials and generally for everyone.

translation.lb: De fiffechen Noper.
translation.en: The clever neighbor.

translation.lb: Zwê guder Noper, wé s'an deser Zeit wéneg mé ze tanne sin, waren de Péter an de Pir tun Hamm.
translation.en: Two good neighbors, as you find fewer and fewer these days, were Peter and Paul from Hamm.

translation.lb: Jiderê fun hinen war Egenthömer fun en èttlech Köppe Land, ower weil kên e Perd liât, tir dé ze pléen an ze bearbechten, do huot et muonchmol bei hinne' gelappt, weil si krûte' fir Gèld a gut Wuort wuol hir Arbecht fun desein oder dêm Bauer gemâcht, ower net éschter, bis dê' sein êgent fierdeg hât an da gewénlech hir Grompere' geplantzt gôwen, wann dé aner hir gehèft hâten.
translation.en: Each of them owned a few heads of land, but since there was no horse to plough and work it, sometimes they would wait until they got money or a good word and had their work done by someone else or another farmer, but not before he had finished his own and usually after he had planted his potatoes, whenever the others had harvested theirs.

translation.lb: „Wêss du wât?" sot e guden Dâg de Pir zum Péter, ech wêss e gudde Möttel, fir ôns zwê aus der Nôt ze hèllefen!"
translation.en: "Do you know what?" said Paul to Peter one fine day, "I know a good way for us both to help ourselves out of this trouble!"

translation.lb: „An dât wir?-'frot de Péter.
translation.en: "And what would that be?" asked Peter.

translation.lb: „Mir kâfen ons e Perd zesumme a bebaue' mat dêm sèlwer onst Land."
translation.en: "We buy a horse together and cultivate our land with it ourselves."

translation.lb: „Dei Rôt ass net schlècht!" sot de Péter, ma e Perd ass en rJgentom, dât ons am Enn opfriésse' könnt."
translation.en: "That advice isn't bad!" said Peter, "but a horse is a possession that could end up eating us out of house and home."

translation.lb: „Och watt!" sot du de Pir, dât wèrd nach net Hais a' Bê' kaschten.
translation.en: "Oh, come on!" said Paul, "that won't cost as much as a house and a barn.

translation.lb: Mir dehlen ôns drân; du suorgs fir d'Fuder an ech tir den Dronk.
translation.en: We share it; you take care of the feed and I take care of the drink.

translation.lb: Wé mèngs de?"
translation.en: What do you think?"

translation.lb: Dem Péter niuss dem Pir sei' Firschlâg dach net a' sei Krom gepasst hun, wèll en huot de Kapp gorösselt a gesot:
translation.en: Peter must not have liked Paul's suggestion, because he shook his head and said:

translation.lb: Wann d'Pèrd net mé Duscht hätt wés du, da' kéms du gut ewèch, wèll an dengem Liéwen huos du nach kê Patt gedronkt."
translation.en: "If only the horse didn't get thirsty, you would manage well, because in your life, you've never even drunk a pint."

translation.lb: Haut sin dé zwê allbekannt Kébaueren zu Hamm.

translation.lb: MEMORANDUM un de Jängy Serres, Wuelessem Enner enger gro'sser bedélegong vun en etlech honnert menschen hu mir e mëttwoch de 24. october 1945 d'begängnes vun onsem le' wen an onvergiéssleche komerod a refractaire de Jängy Serres gefeiert.
translation.en: MEMORANDUM to Jängy Serres, Wuelessem Under a large participation of several hundred people, we celebrated the memorial of our beloved and unforgettable comrade and defiant opponent Jängy Serres on Wednesday, October 24, 1945.

translation.lb: Leider wor et ons nach durch verschidde grënn net vergönnt gewiéscht, seng stiérwlech iwerreschter eriwer ze huelen, a mir müssen domatt bis spe'der Warden — egal — et wor eng schlicht an dach eng sehe' feier, a jidderén huet bewisen, we' se'er datt him den heildendo'd vum Jängy zu hèrze gâng ass,
translation.en: Unfortunately, for various reasons, we have not yet been granted the permission to take over his mortal remains, and we must wait until later for that—anyway—it was a simple yet dignified ceremony, and everyone proved how deeply Jängy's heroic death touched their hearts,

translation.lb: an de' zwo' riéden vun den hèren David a Knaff haten e klengen tro'scht fir d'familjen, de' nach bis elo zu der traureger nouvelle emmer an der hoffnong geliéwt hât, hire le'we jong erem ze gesin.
translation.en: and the two speeches by gentlemen David and Knaff offered small comfort to the families, who until now always lived in hope despite the sad news of seeing their dear son again.

translation.lb: De Jängy wor e gudde jong a vu jidderengem bele'wt gewiéscht an d'leidd hun all gemengt et kënnt net sin, we' si d'nouveHe vu sengem do'd kritt hun.
translation.en: Jängy was a good boy and liked by everyone and people all thought it couldn’t be true when they received the news of his death.

translation.lb: Nodém datt hién en etlech me'nl hei am land verstoppt wor, ass hién an d'Frankrcich viru komm, wo' hién durch feige verrot vun engem Letzeburger durch d'preisesch spirnues opfond gin ass.
translation.en: After he had been hiding for several months here in the country, he advanced to France, where he was discovered by the Prussian spies through the cowardly betrayal of a Luxembourger.

translation.lb: Sei wé huet durch verschidde beriichtegt preisesch prlsongen a KZer gefo'ert bis en endlech zu Dietz un der Lahn als é vun de sîwen e'schten vu 16 letzeburger jongen sei jongt liéwen den 19. 9. 44 fir ons hémecht an ons befreiong hir gin huet.
translation.en: His path led through various notorious Prussian prisons and concentration camps until he finally ended up at Dietz on the Lahn as one of the seven first of 16 Luxembourg boys who gave his young life on 19. 9. 44 for our homeland and our liberation.

translation.lb: Nach kurz e puer minutten virun hirem do'd hun si, we' mir durch de géschtlechen aus dem prisong. de pfarrer Friedrich Kneip wessen, aus der le'wt zu hirer hémecht an zui kro'n, d'ietzeburger aationalhymne gesongen,
translation.en: Just a few minutes before their death, as we know from the prison chaplain Pastor Friedrich Kneip, they sang the Luxembourg national anthem out loud to their homeland towards the crown,

translation.lb: an nodém si zesummen de' iescht cigarett gefëmmt haten, an an der rei opgestallt go'wen, hun si nach all eng ke'er ausgeruff: „Vive ons Grande-Duchesse" a „vive onse prince Jang".
translation.en: and after they had smoked one last cigarette together and lined up in a row, they all once again shouted: ‘Long live our Grand Duchess’ and ‘long live our Prince Jean’.

translation.lb: Et woren de' lescht wiérder ir si durch d'preisesch kugelen niddergestreckt go'- wen.
translation.en: Those were the last words before they were struck down by the Prussian bullets.

translation.lb: Et ass dest en herrieche beweis vun daperer heldenhaftegkél an de'wer hémechtsle'wt vun dese jongen, de* trei bis zum leschten otemzuch zu hirem land an zu hirem glaw gehalen hun.
translation.en: It is a magnificent proof of brave heroism and true love of these boys for their homeland, who held fast to their country and faith until their last breath.

translation.lb: Si sin net nemmen holden — nén — si sin och märtyrer, de' muddeg alles erdroen hun fir ons freihét matt hirem hèrzbludu z'erkafen.
translation.en: They are not only heroes—no— they are also martyrs who bravely endured everything to buy us freedom with their heart's blood.

translation.lb: An e'weg wèrde mir si net vergiéssen, si, de' ons allen matt engem oprichfege beispill vu Patriotismus viraus an den do'd gSnge sin.
translation.en: And we will never forget them, those who went ahead into death with an honest example of patriotism for all of us.

translation.lb: An du Jängy, du bass é vun déne jongen, de' alles fir onst le'wt hémechtsland erdroen hun, all quäle vu prisong a KZ, an de' virun aller weit bekannt hun, wat et héscht fir Letzeburg ze kämpfen an och ze stiérwen.
translation.en: And you Jängy, you are one of those boys who endured everything for our beloved homeland, all the torments of prison and concentration camps, and who made known to everyone what it means to fight and also to die for Luxembourg.

translation.lb: Dei numm stét matt gëllene buchstawen agedroen a wanns du och kirperlech do't bass, an onsem géscht liéws du dach weiderhi virun.
translation.en: Your name is inscribed with golden letters and even though you are physically dead, you continue to live in our spirit.

translation.lb: A mir wèrden dir et nimols vergiéssen, wats du an déne stonnen zu Dietz un der Lahn fir ons all erdroen hues.
translation.en: And we will never forget what you endured for us all in those hours at Dietz on the Lahn.

translation.lb: D’wahlen a Portugal.

translation.lb: No déclaratio'nen vum portugieseschen ausseminister huet d'regirong 60*/t vun de stemmen kritt.

translation.en: A total of 1 million Portuguese were eligible to vote.

translation.lb: D'oppositio'nsparteien hun erklärt, datt d'wahlbedélegong an énzelne ge'gcnden nëmme 25 Prozent gewiéscht wir, a munchen uertschaften eso'guer nemme 6 prozent.
translation.en: The opposition parties have declared that voter turnout in certain regions was only 25 percent, and in some municipalities even as low as 6 percent.

translation.lb: Memberen vun den oppositio'nsparteien, de' an de wiéllocaler nokucke wollten, wivill stemmen ofgi wire gin, si matt gewalt aus de localer erausgeheit gin.
translation.en: Members of the opposition parties who wanted to observe the number of votes cast in the polling stations were forcibly thrown out of the stations.

translation.lb: A Portugal soll d'presszensur erem agefo'ert gin.
translation.en: In Portugal, press censorship is to be reintroduced.

translation.en: The gentlemen yellow men must do a colossal task in the ground if they have to make their propaganda with their neat handwriting.

translation.en: We know here who the bandits, plunderers, and thieves are, and if the person concerned does not know, they should ask their colleagues, the local group leaders from the Syrdall, who stole here, particularly in the last fourteen days.

translation.lb: Et heut sech erausgestallt, datt am laf vun de nokrlchsjores leidd aus industriellen a commer- Cielle beruffer op d'land komm sin an zu preisser, de' Kr d'IandbevëHcerong onerschménglech woren.
translation.en: It has turned out that over the past years, people from industrial and commercial professions have come to the land and at prices that were unaffordable for the rural population.

translation.lb: land a buedem ans de bauerenh&nn gérais hun.
translation.en: Land and soil have ended up in the hands of non-farmers.

translation.lb: D'follech dovunner wor, datt de bauer, dé virdrun als égentëmmer op aénger égener scholl geschafft a gewirtschaft hat, um enn zum piéchter a lo'narbechter erofgesonk ass.
translation.en: The consequence was that the farmer, who previously worked and managed on his own land as an owner, eventually was reduced to a tenant and laborer.

translation.lb: De' zo'stänn müssen é fir allemol ophe'eren.
translation.en: These conditions must end once and for all.

translation.lb: Déje'negen, dén d'land beakert a bebaut, dém soll et och gehe'eren.
translation.en: Those who cultivate and farm the land should also own it.

translation.lb: Et soll him me'glecb sin, zo' uerdentleche preisser, de' ▼un offizieller seit no dem ravenit festgeluecht gin, d'land z'erueweren an et als égentom ze bewirtschaften.
translation.en: It should be possible for him, at reasonable prices, established officially according to revenue, to acquire the land and manage it as property.

translation.lb: Iwert lie bescliloss vun der jugoslawescher nalionaiversamnilong, d'monarchie a Jugoslawien ze beseltegen an durch eng republik ze ersetzen,
translation.en: Regarding the decision of the Yugoslav National Assembly to abolish the monarchy in Yugoslavia and replace it with a republic,

translation.lb: hne't de kinek Peter den II. eu Jugoslawien zu London eng erklärong veröffentlecbt.
translation.en: King Peter II of Yugoslavia published a declaration in London.

translation.lb: An deser erkläroag beschëllegt hién de niarschall Tito a Jugoslawien en totalitäre regime oprieblen ze weilen an dem vollek d'entschédoug, ob Jugoslawien eng monarchie oder eng repnblik sollt gin, aus den hänn grrnss ze hun.
translation.en: In this declaration, he accused Marshal Tito in Yugoslavia of establishing a totalitarian regime, depriving the people of the decision whether Yugoslavia should be a monarchy or a republic.

translation.lb: D'prokiamatlo'n vun der jugnslaweseber repnblik, so' sot blé», ass nel vnn baut op muer beschloss gin, mé si ass d'resultat vun länge virberedendcn aetio'nen vun dem Tito senger partri.
translation.en: The proclamation of the Yugoslav republic, as he said, was not decided overnight, but is the result of long-term preparatory actions by Tito's party.

translation.lb: Des entsehédong hätl misse vum ganze jugoslawesehe vollek getraff gin a net nëmme vun der natioualversammlong, de' nuren aus uiembereu vum Tito senger Nationalfront bestét.
translation.en: This decision should have been made by the entire Yugoslav people and not just by the national assembly, which consists only of members of Tito's National Front.

translation.lb: Den Tito wir senge vcrpflichtongen, de' hién am ofkommen mam Soubatschitsch versprach bât, net nnkomm.
translation.en: Tito did not fulfill his obligations, which he promised in the agreement with Subasic.

translation.lb: Hién, de kinek, géng de kämpf virufe'ercn bis datt d'tyrannei a Jugoslawien brseitegt wäc au dMugoslawen erem frei ménongsau haiidlongsfreihét hätten.
translation.en: He, the king, would continue the fight until tyranny in Yugoslavia was overthrown and the Yugoslavs had their freedom of speech and freedom of action again.

translation.lb: buet och de' Ire'- er klnegln vu Jugoslawien.

translation.lb: Maria,
translation.en: Maria,

translation.lb: D'brlleseh regirong bemirkt he»- zo' riatt d'jogoslawcseb wählen am sënn vun den demoeratesehe principien dnrehgefe'ert wlre gln an datt sl de* vom vnllek gewlélte reglrong unerkenne ge'w.

translation.lb: Clarence Raybould De Clarence Raybould, 2te chef vom B. B. C. Symphonie-orchester ass elo kurz vun enger tournée aus Holland eremkomm.
translation.en: Clarence Raybould, the second conductor of the B. B. C. Symphony Orchestra, has just returned from a tour in Holland.

translation.lb: Hié wor no Amsterdam invite'ert fir den e'schten vun enger rei vu concert'en ze dirige'eren, de' d'Concertgebow Orchester, dat fir d'e'scht nom krich erem opgetrueden ass, get.
translation.en: He was invited to Amsterdam to conduct the first in a series of concerts by the Concertgebouw Orchestra, which performed for the first time since the war.

translation.lb: (De Willem Mengelberg ass bekanntlech vun den Hollänner gelicht gin, well en é collaborateur wor).
translation.en: (Willem Mengelberg was famously removed by the Dutch because he was a collaborator).

translation.lb: Den e'schte concert wor e gro'sse succès.
translation.en: The first concert was a great success.

translation.lb: De Clarence Raybould hat haptsächlech englesch wierker op sei Programm gesät z. b. end sintonietta vum E. J. Mooran, de' vill uklank bei den Hollänner fond hun.
translation.en: Clarence Raybould mainly included English works in his program, such as ‘End Sintonietta’ by E. J. Mooran, which was very well received by the Dutch.

translation.lb: Op dem zwéte concert, dén hién do gin huet, huet e missen sei progranyn änneren an de' wierker bréngen de' e schon um e'schte concert dirige'ert liât.
translation.en: In the second concert he conducted there, he had to change his program and include works he had already conducted at the first concert.

translation.lb: (D'Concertgebow ass iwregen3 erem a schwonk).
translation.en: (By the way, the Concertgebouw is back in full swing).

translation.lb: De Clarence Raybould ass als dirigent é vun déne beschten aus England.
translation.en: Clarence Raybould is regarded as one of the best conductors from England.

translation.lb: En ass oft ze he'eren vu London aus.
translation.en: He can often be heard from London.

translation.lb: Frankreich nach emmer o ’ ni premierminister
translation.en: France still without a prime minister

translation.lb: Och de Georges Bidault ass gescheitert
translation.en: Even Georges Bidault has failed

translation.lb: Sozialisten a radicalsozialiste wèrten e candidat opsetzen-
translation.en: Socialists and radical socialists will propose a candidate,

translation.lb: D’sozialiste nemme fir regirong ennert kommunistescher fe’er ong-
translation.en: The socialists only want to govern under a communist guidance,

translation.lb: D’kommuniste formell ge’nt M.R.P. regirong
translation.en: Communists formally against M.R.P. governance.

translation.lb: Edouard Herriot a Felix Gouin gin am méschte genannt
translation.en: Edouard Herriot and Felix Gouin are mentioned the most.

translation.lb: Pareis. — D'kommu.niste.sch partei vu Frankreich huet geseilter hir revanche iwer d'nidderlag vu virgëschter gefeiert,
translation.en: Paris. — The Communist Party of France celebrated their revenge for the defeat of the day before yesterday,

translation.lb: andern de candidat fir d'miniaterpresiden tschaft, de jetzege Premierminister Georges Bidault net de' erfuerderlech majorite't vu stemmen op sei numm veréncgc könnt,
translation.en: when the candidate for the presidency, the current Prime Minister Georges Bidault could not gather the necessary majority of votes for his name,

translation.lb: E krut nemmen 201 stemmen, warenddém don Thorez der 259 kritt hât.
translation.en: He only received 201 votes, whereas Thorez received 259.

translation.lb: Fir de Bidault hu gestemmt sämtlech membere vum MRP eo'we' de' verschidde rechtsparteien,
translation.en: All members of the MRP along with various right-wing parties voted for Bidault,

translation.lb: d'kommunisten, d'sozialisten an d'radica.lsozialisten hun derge'nt gestemmt, wârend'dém d'Union démocratique vun der Resistenz fir hiren égene candidat Petit gestemmt huet.
translation.en: the communists, socialists, and radical socialists voted against, while the Democratic Union of Resistance voted for their own candidate Petit.

translation.lb: De nèxten dënschdeg soll e ncie versuch gemâch gin, de neie m i ni Storp resident ze wiélen.
translation.en: Next Tuesday, a new attempt will be made to elect the new minister president.

translation.lb: Et get ugeholl, datt des ke'er d'sozialisten oder d'radicalso-zialisten e candidat présente'ere wèrten,
translation.en: It is assumed that this time the socialists or radical socialists will present a candidate,

translation.lb: zemols weil d'sozialiste sech geweigert hun, eng regirong z'ënncrstëtzen, de' net vun d'e kommunisten ugefo'ert ge'f gin.
translation.en: especially because the socialists have refused to support a government not led by communists.

translation.lb: Wann et gelengt e Sozialist als Premierminister durchzedrécken, da werten ongefe'er all Parteien an der neier regirong vertrnede sin mat ausnahm ower vun der repubilikanescher freihötspartel.
translation.en: If it succeeds to push through a Socialist as Prime Minister, almost all parties will be represented in the new government, except the republican freedom party.

translation.lb: Am méschte genannt gip de radicajsozial; st Edouard Herriot an den Yvon Delbos, fre'eren ausseminister,
translation.en: The most mentioned are the radical socialist Edouard Herriot and Yvon Delbos, former foreign minister,

translation.lb: wärenddem de Félix Gouin als candidat vun de Sozialisten am méschten cite'ert get.
translation.en: while Félix Gouin is most often cited as the socialist candidate.

translation.lb: Zum schluss vun der zwéter isëtzong huet de président V. Auriol erklärt, d'regirongskris misst endleeh iwerwonne gin
translation.en: At the end of the second session, President V. Auriol declared that the government crisis must finally be overcome

translation.lb: an huet en d'eheffe vun de kommunisten, Maurice Thorcz a Jacques Duclos so'we' de'je'neg vum MRP, Maurice Schumann a Robert Dclcourt agelueden an enger extraeëtzong hir ménonge bekanntzegin.
translation.en: and he invited the leaders of the communists, Maurice Thorez and Jacques Duclos, as well as those from the MRP, Maurice Schumann and Robert Delcourt, to express their opinions in an extra session.

translation.lb: No deser extrasëtzong huet ké vun denen uewegenannten eppes iwer d're<sultat vun de bespriéchonge bekannt wolle mächen.
translation.en: After this extra session, none of those mentioned wanted to make anything known about the result of the discussions.

translation.lb: Nuren d'eheffe vum MRP hun erklärt, si ge'wen hirem exécutivcomité vun der partei e rapport iwer des bespriéchongen ofléen.
translation.en: Only the leaders of the MRP declared they would submit a report to their party's executive committee about these discussions.

translation.lb: D'politesch beobachter sin der ménong, datt all parteimanöveren, de* elo agelét gin, d'oppositio'n tëscht engem lénksb-lock,
translation.en: Political observers believe that all party maneuvers now initiated will strengthen the opposition between a left bloc,

translation.lb: dé vun de kommunisten ugefo'ert get an dem anti-kommunistesche block, dé vum MRP dirige'ert get, nach me' stârk mâche wèrten.
translation.en: led by the communists, and the anti-communist bloc, led by the MRP.

translation.lb: An de kulisse vun der nationalversammlong get emmer me' fir d'zo'konft vun enger parlamentarescher regirong gefârt.
translation.en: Behind the scenes of the national assembly, concerns about the future of a parliamentary government continue to grow.

translation.lb: Trotzdém hun ail riédner, vun de kommuniste bis zur extrem rechster d'no'twennegkét ënnerstrac-h, jidfer retard an der ernennong vun engem Premierminister z'évite'eren fir „de frang ze retten".
translation.en: Nevertheless, all speakers, from the communists to the far right, emphasized the necessity of avoiding any delay in appointing a Prime Minister "to save the franc".

translation.lb: Heng partei wëllt ausschle'sslech o'ni d'bedélegong vun de kommuniis-te rege/eren,
translation.en: Each party wants to govern exclusively without the involvement of the communists,

translation.lb: mé d'majorite't wëllt hinne net d'voll verantwortong iwerlôssen.
translation.en: but the majority does not want to give them full responsibility.

translation.lb: Dorop e chef vun der kommunistescher partei an dere'schter sëtzong miatt dem saz geäntwert: „Wat haut net kënnt, muss no'tgedronge muer dach kommen."
translation.en: To that, a leader of the communist party responded in the remaining session with the phrase: "What doesn't come today must be enforced tomorrow."

translation.lb: Gëschter mueren hât d'kommunistesch partei sech versammelt, wo'bei eng resolutio'n uge-holl go'f, d-att d'kommuniste sech u kenger regirong bedélege ge'wen, dfe' vum MRP ugefe'ert ge'f gin.
translation.en: Yesterday morning, the communist party met and passed a resolution that they would not participate in a government led by the MRP.

translation.lb: D'candidatur vum Maurice Thorez go'f zréckgezun.
translation.en: The candidacy of Maurice Thorez was withdrawn.

translation.lb: Op dèr anerer seit huet d'icommunistesch partei neischt ge'nt eng sozialistesch oder radicalsozialistesch presidentschaft
translation.en: On the other hand, the communist party had nothing against a socialist or radical socialist presidency.

translation.lb: Zu gleicher zeit hât och d'radicalsozialistesch partei eng versammlong an dèr beschilo3s go'f, d'candidatur vum Georges Bidault net z'ënnerstëtzen.
translation.en: At the same time, the radical socialist party held a meeting where they decided not to support Georges Bidault's candidacy.

translation.lb: Wié sche’sst den e’schte goal?
translation.en: Who will score the first goal?

translation.lb: Weggdigen.
translation.en: In Weggdigen.

translation.lb: — Et ass un an fir sech ké weltbedeitcnde virfall, et Tiedeit iéwer an den annalen vum Letzehurger fo'ssball bestimmt eppes.
translation.en: — It is not a world-significant event in itself, but certainly something noteworthy in the annals of Luxembourgish football.

translation.lb: wat bis elo nach hext seilen virko'ni:
translation.en: something that until now has rarely occurred:

translation.lb: No 7 championnatsspiller fe'ert onsen l'o'ssballclub „Arminia" am 2. bezirk vun der 3. divisio n matt 37 goals, o rii bis elo in inzegen goal geschoss krit ze hun.
translation.en: After 7 championship games, our football club 'Arminia' leads in the 2nd district of the 3rd division with 37 goals, not having received a single goal yet.

translation.lb: Watfir eng équipe bringt et iördeg.
translation.en: Which team will manage to do it.

translation.lb: Weggdigen den e'schten goal opzehenken"?
translation.en: In Weggdigen, to score the first goal?

translation.lb: Oder huet vleicht d'Armenia wëlles, sech durch de ganze championnat o'ni 6 verloschgoal durechzequitschen?
translation.en: Or does Arminia perhaps intend to go through the whole championship without conceding a goal?

translation.lb: Wann dat de fall soll sin, an si réusse'eren dermatt.
translation.en: If that is the case, and they succeed with this.

translation.lb: da kann en de verein nuren op dat allerhiérzlechst félicite'eren!
translation.en: then one can only most heartily congratulate the club!

translation.lb: F. A. O. Och Letzehurg wor op der internationaler eonferenz vertrueden, de' d'Food and Agrlcultural Organisation zu Copenhagen ofgchalcn huct.
translation.en: Luxembourg was represented at the international conference convened by the Food and Agriculture Organization in Copenhagen.

translation.lb: Do go'f de plang Orr (no sengem amarikaneschen autor Orr benannt) discute'ert.
translation.en: The Orr Plan (named after its American author, Orr) was discussed there.

translation.lb: Dé bestét doranner, datt d'iiéwesmëttel ans der ganzer weit besser verdélt solle gin, fir ze verhënneren, datt an engem land d'leidd vun honger stiérwen an datt am anere land de caffi an de wésS an d'mier geschott oder verbrannt gin.
translation.en: It consists of distributing foodstuffs more effectively worldwide to prevent people dying of hunger in one country while in another coffee and wheat are thrown into the sea or burned.

translation.lb: Ocb d'preisser vun de landwirtschaftleche producter solle stabilise'- ert gin.
translation.en: Also, the prices of agricultural products should be stabilized.

translation.lb: We' wëllt de plang Orr dat erréchen?
translation.en: How does the Orr Plan intend to achieve this?

translation.lb: „Par le stockage des excédents pendant les années de surproduction et leur écoulement au cours des années maigres".
translation.en: "By storing surpluses during years of overproduction and distributing them during lean years."

translation.lb: (Echo de l'Industrie 5 oct.)
translation.en: (Echo de l'Industrie, 5 October)

translation.lb: Mé d'conferenz wor sech kior, datt den ausgleich nemme me'glech ass, wann de' reich länner sech sacrificer opléen.
translation.en: But the conference was well aware that balance is only possible if the rich countries are willing to make sacrifices.

translation.lb: Russland get land zréck
translation.en: Russia gives land back

translation.lb: E spriécher vun der e'streichescher regirong huet gëschter mattgedélt, datt d'russesch militärautorite'ten seeh entschlosa hun, eng partie Tun dem land, Trat si a Niddere'streich confisque'ert haten, der e'streichescher regirong erem zur verfügong ze stellen.
translation.en: A spokesperson for the Austrian government announced yesterday that the Russian military authorities have decided to return part of the land that they had confiscated in Lower Austria to the Austrian government.

translation.lb: Si haten ufänglech 51.000 ha beschlagnahmt a behale nach 21.000 ha.
translation.en: They initially seized 51,000 hectares and still retain 21,000 hectares.

translation.lb: Dat land, wat si elo behalen, wor fre'er haptsächlech terrain, wo' manöveren drop ofgehale go'wen.
translation.en: The land they are keeping now was primarily used for maneuvers earlier.

translation.lb: D'Sussen hun sech och berét erklärt, all sôt, de' si durch des confisquatio'n ze vill kruten, der e'streichescher regirong erem ze gin.
translation.en: The Russians have also agreed to return any surplus grain they received through this confiscation to the Austrian government.

translation.lb: Desen entschloss huet d'russesch militärregirong gefâsst, nodäm d'Unrra bekannt gemäch hht, datt e land, an dém durch allie'ert truppe land confisque'ert wir gin, net me' matt liéwensmëttel beliwert ge'w gin.
translation.en: This decision was made by the Russian military government after UNRRA announced that any country where land had been confiscated by allied troops would no longer be supplied with food.

translation.lb: Sonndeg, de 24. märz.
translation.en: Sunday, March 24th.

translation.lb: D'Russe fänken un, den Iran z'évacue'eren.
translation.en: The Russians begin to evacuate Iran.

translation.lb: Zu Strôssburg hält de président Gouin eng wichteg riéd iwer d'franse'sch innen- an aussepolitik.
translation.en: In Strasbourg, President Gouin gives an important speech about French domestic and foreign policy.

translation.lb: Den Tito déll dem Parlament matt, datt de Mikhaitowitçh vu sengen truppe gefânge go'w.
translation.en: Tito informs the Parliament that Mikhaitowitsch has been captured by his troops.

translation.lb: Amerika muss stârk bleiwen *
translation.en: America must remain strong *

translation.lb: De' neist riéd vum président Truman huet an der ganzer amerikanescher press e gro'ssen echo fond, de' a me' oder we'neger gro'sse commentaren des riéd commente'eren.
translation.en: President Truman's latest speech found a great echo in the entire American press, with more or less extensive commentaries on this speech.

translation.lb: Reportere mellen: Dem Truman seng neist riéd beweist, datt Amerika gewëllt ass seng gesamt machtmëttele fir d'ennerstëtzong vun der UNO anzesetzen, well si dat wirksamst instrument fir d'oprechterhale vum fridden duerstelle ge'w.
translation.en: Reporters report: Truman's latest speech demonstrates that America is willing to deploy all its power resources to support the UNO, as it represents the most effective instrument for maintaining peace.

translation.lb: De président huet d'Amerikaner virdru gewarnt, ze vill eng schnell démobilise'erong ze verlangen.
translation.en: The president previously warned Americans against demanding too rapid a demobilization.

translation.lb: Virléfeg gin d'klasse nach zum militärdengscht agezun, we' dat virgesi wor.
translation.en: For the time being, the classes are still being drafted for military service, as was intended.

translation.lb: De président ass iwerzégt, datt d'UNO am stand ass, de weltfridden tëschent de vëlker oprechtz'erhalen, obschon tëschent hinne gro'ss ënnerschéder an den traditio'nen, de weltuschauongen an an den intresse bestin.
translation.en: The president is convinced that the UNO is capable of maintaining world peace among the nations, despite the great differences in traditions, worldviews, and interests between them.

translation.lb: Iwer d'situatio'n am noen an am fèren oste sot de président Truman: Et si keng länner, de' am noen an am fèren oste so' gro'ss intressen hpn, datt d'UNO net amstand wir de' énzel froen, de' sech doraus ergin, ze le'sen.
translation.en: Regarding the situation in the Near and Far East, President Truman said: There are no countries in the Near and Far East with such great interests that the UNO would not be able to address the individual issues arising from them.

translation.lb: Hién erkennt un, datt Russland an England do gro'ss intressen hun, awer hién ass iwerzégt, datt de' be'd länner alles asetze fir eng friddlech verstännegong z'erréchen an domatt d'wierk vun der UNO z'ënnerstétzen.
translation.en: He acknowledges that Russia and England have significant interests there, but he is convinced that both countries will do everything to achieve a peaceful understanding and thereby support the work of the UNO.

translation.lb: Desch-Tennis DESCH-TENNIS D. T. Ho’wald—D. T. Mondorf?,???
translation.en: Table Tennis TABLE TENNIS D. T. Howald—D. T. Mondorf?,???

translation.lb: Haut den owend em 8 auer fënd am café Friedrich um Ho'wald dé matt spannong erwârte match D. T. Ho'wald ge'nt D. T, Mondorf statt.
translation.en: Tonight at 8 o'clock, the eagerly awaited match between D. T. Howald and D. T. Mondorf will take place at Café Friedrich in Howald.

translation.lb: D. T. Mondorf, eng matt dénc stärksten équipen trëtt complett un, d. h. matt dem letzeburger champion Roeser Pierre an sengem brudder Roeser Jeng;
translation.en: D. T. Mondorf, one of the strongest teams, competes fully staffed, with the Luxembourg champion Roeser Pierre and his brother Roeser Jeng;

translation.lb: de numm vun dcsen 2 spiller genügt schon elleng fir e verwinnt publikum, we' de letzeburger én ass, vollkommen ze befriddegen.
translation.en: the name of these two players alone is enough to fully satisfy a demanding audience, as they are Luxembourgish.

translation.lb: Wann de' 2 elo nach als gégner ké geréngeren we' de Steimetz Metty, Fischer, Wiltzius a Lamesch Mich hun, so' ass do succès vun dem owend gesechert an et lo'nt sech fir ail dësch-tennis-unhânger sech op den Ho'wald zc déplace'eren.
translation.en: If the two now have opponents no lesser than Steinmetz Metty, Fischer, Wiltzius, and Lamesch Mich, then the success of the evening is ensured, and it is worth it for all table tennis enthusiasts to head to Howald.

translation.lb: Den D. T. Ho'wald, encourage'ert durch hire sche'ne sieg vun e sonndeg, muss alles drusetzen fir och dese match ze gewannen an et ass um Steimetz, Fischer, Wiltzius, Lameseh a Schneider zc beweisen, datt den D. T. Ho'wald matt recht zu der beschter équipe hei am land gereohent get.
translation.en: D. T. Howald, emboldened by their fine victory on Sunday, must do everything to win this match as well, and it is up to Steinmetz, Fischer, Wiltzius, Lamesch, and Schneider to prove that D. T. Howald is rightly considered one of the best teams in the country.

translation.lb: Am virspill trëtt d'reservenéquipe matt Krecké, J. Entringer, Leclerc Raym., Leclerc R. a Mme Wiltzius ge'nt d'reserven vum D. T. Mondorf un.
translation.en: In the preliminary game, the reserve team with Krecké, J. Entringer, Leclerc Raym., Leclerc R., and Mme Wiltzius will compete against the reserves of D. T. Mondorf.

translation.lb: Fir den dfe'schtennis ze forderen get fir dese gro'sse match kén entrée opgehuewen..„.jame...
translation.en: To promote table tennis, no entrance fee will be charged for this big match... „...jame...

translation.en: The committee.

translation.lb: Den hèr KRIER, arbechtsminister, stellt matt bedauere fest, datt d'kris am biergbau scho bal e joer dauert.
translation.en: Mr. KRIER, Minister of Labor, regretfully notes that the mining crisis has been ongoing for almost a year.

translation.lb: Hic fret sech awer, soen ze kennen, datt alles gemäch go'w fir de specler vun der arbechlslo'segkét ze bannen a beto'nt-, datt och d'palronat an dem zesummenhank vill verständnes gewisen huet.
translation.en: However, he is pleased to report that everything is being done to counteract the rise of unemployment, emphasizing that the management has shown a lot of understanding in this context.

translation.lb: D'kris am biergbau huet verschidden ursâclien.
translation.en: The mining crisis has different causes.

translation.lb: E'schtens ass de franse'sche minett durchsohnëttlech besser a me' bëldeg an zwétens get we'nt ■ manktem u kueile gesiebt, dese manktem durch d'verschaffe vu me' reichhaltegen èrzer auszegleichen.
translation.en: Firstly, the French ore is generally better and cheaper, and secondly, due to a shortage of coal, this shortage is balanced by processing more rich ores.

translation.lb: D'kris ass awer net eso' katastrophal, we' se vleicht schéngt.
translation.en: The crisis is not as catastrophic as it might seem.

translation.lb: Et go'wen ronn 200 minueren a kënnegong gesät, de' awer all soss arbecht fond hun an de' och d'virrecht behalen, herno erem als e'scht an de minièren agestallt ze gin.
translation.en: Around 200 miners were given notice, but they all found other work and also retain the right to be the first to be reemployed in the mines later.

translation.lb: Fir der kris ze steieren, go'sv e Conseil Supérieur des Mines institue'ert, dén d'missio'n huel, den assainissement vum biergbau an d'wé ze Jeden a sech matt allen aneren Qafenden an zo'kënflege biergbauproblemen ze befassen.
translation.en: To steer through the crisis, a Superior Council of Mines has been established with the mission to address the restructuring of mining and to tackle all present and future mining problems.

translation.lb: Et lafen iwregens och scho verhandlongen, de' ons als preisesch krichsschuedréparatio'n,,Erzbereicherungs"-installatio'ne séchere sollen.
translation.en: Negotiations are also already underway to secure installations for ore enrichment as part of Prussian war reparations.

translation.lb: Och fir Stèngefort ble't wirklech erem eng zo'konft, well et ass do d'installatio'n vun enger mëttclindustrie envisage'ert, de' seeh matt der productio'n vu glaswoll, kesselen asw. befâsse soll.
translation.en: There is indeed a future for Stengefort as well, as the installation of a middle industry is planned, which will deal with the production of glass wool, boilers, etc.

translation.en: FOR CLARIFICATION

translation.lb: Den actio'nscomité vun der L'nlo'n an d'directio'n vun der zeidong „d'Unio'n" déclare'ere formell, datt de' be'swëllegerweis verbrét gerüchter, „d'Unio'n" wir an de besetz vun der dréckerei Bourg- Rourger iwcrgâiig, votlstänneg aus der loft gegraff sin.
translation.en: The action committee of the Union and the management of the newspaper 'the Union' formally declare that the maliciously spread rumors, 'the Union' was transferred to the possession of the Bourg-Rourger printing house, are completely unfounded.

translation.lb: D'zeidong gehc'ert gené we' fre'er der „Unio'n vun de Letzeburger Freihétsorganisatio'nen".
translation.en: The newspaper belongs just as before to the 'Union of Luxembourgish Freedom Organizations'.

translation.lb: Si ënnerstét énzeg an eleng dem gewiéite comité vun der Unio'n ënnert der verantwortlecher directio'n vun dém durch de congress bestëmmte mann.
translation.en: It exclusively supports the elected committee of the Union under the responsible direction of the man designated by the congress.

translation.lb: Des falsch gerüchter sin ënnert d'leidd bruecht gin, fir ons liéser confus an ofspensteg ze mächen.
translation.en: These false rumors have been spread to make our readers confused and rebellious.

translation.lb: Mir wessen ower, dattons frënn ons weider trei blelwen.
translation.en: However, we know that our friends will remain loyal to us.

translation.lb: Mir wessen, da'it se grad elo, wo' d'hannerlëschteg ugrëff op d'Unio'n nés me' stärk agesat hun. un hirer onofhängeger, freier zeidong festhaien.
translation.en: We know that they will now, when the sneaky attacks on the Union have intensified again, hold on to their independent, free newspaper.

translation.lb: De' schc'nst bestätcgong Ii wert ons de' vun dag zu dag zo'hueiend zuei vu liéser.
translation.en: The best confirmation is the day-by-day increasing number of readers for us.

translation.en: The action committee of the Union

translation.lb: D'directio'n vun der zeidong „d'Union".
translation.en: The management of the newspaper 'the Union'.

translation.lb: Zweschefäll zu Gibraltar
translation.en: Incident in Gibraltar

translation.lb: D'local press vu Gibraltar mellt en zwëschefall tëschent den Englänner an den Australier.
translation.en: The local press from Gibraltar reports an incident between the English and the Australians.

translation.lb: En détachement vun australeschen truppen, de' um siegesdéfilé zu London délgehoM haten, ass o,p Gibraltar komm, fir sedh d 'fest on g unzekucken.
translation.en: A detachment of Australian troops, who had participated in the victory parade in London, came to Gibraltar to view the fortifications.

translation.lb: D'englesch polizei huet e besoffenen zaldot verhaft.
translation.en: The English police arrested a drunken soldier.

translation.lb: Duerophin hun d'australesoh zaidofen d'englesch polizei ugegraff.
translation.en: Consequently, the Australian soldiers attacked the English police.

translation.lb: Iwer 50 Australier go'we verhaft.
translation.en: Over 50 Australians were arrested.

translation.lb: Eng doze polizisten hu missten an d'spidol iwerfo'ert gin.
translation.en: A dozen policemen had to be taken to the hospital.

translation.lb: Mir mächen heimadden d'schwârzarbechter an onser gemeng drop opmicrksam, datt mir an zo'konft matt aller schärft ge'nt d'schwârzarbecht an aile branche virgin.
translation.en: We hereby make the informal workers in our commune aware that we will henceforth act with all severity against illegal work in all sectors.

translation.lb: Mir leide net me', datt ons memberen, de' fir d'ausiibong vun hirem handwierk schwe'er steiere bczuelen a jôrelâng musse stoen, fir hire méschtertitel ze kre'en, op des mane'er geschädegt rcsp. hirt bro't geholl kre'en.
translation.en: We will no longer tolerate that our members, who pay high taxes for practicing their craft and have to work for years to earn their master title, are harmed in this way and have their livelihood taken away.

translation.lb: Et sin ons eng parti fäll bekannt, a ■wann de' leidd hirt verbuedend dreiwe net so'fort asteilen, gi mir rücksichtslos ge'nt se vir.
translation.en: We are aware of a number of cases, and if those involved do not immediately cease their illegal activities, we will proceed against them mercilessly.
