translation.en: 25-year service anniversary

translation.lb: Deser (leg go'wen.et 25 joer, datt d madame Hegermann-Feller bei der Firma Sternberg agetratt ass.
translation.en: This past year marked 25 years since Madame Hegermann-Feller joined the Sternberg company.

translation.lb: D'Firma Sternberg liuet drop gehalen, bei deser geléenhét eng kleng feier fir de persona! ze veranstalten an huet der jubilarin a'ls erënnerong an als dank fir hir trei dengschter eng gellen auer iwerrécht.
translation.en: The Sternberg company took the occasion to organize a small celebration for the personnel and presented the honoree with a golden watch as a reminder and thanks for her loyal services.

translation.lb: Och de personal buet drop gehalen, der madame He germann, de' bei jidferengem bele ft ass, e klenge souvenir z'iwerréchen.
translation.en: The staff also made sure to give Madame Hegermann, who is appreciated by everyone, a small souvenir.

translation.lb: Mir wën sehen der jubilarin nach nodre'giech vill gléck.
translation.en: We wish the honoree continued good luck in the future.

translation.lb: Jidderengem sei goût....
translation.en: To each their own taste....

translation.lb: Dem Errol Flynn sein ass d’mier
translation.en: For Errol Flynn, it's the sea

translation.lb: Eso' bal d'arbechten am studio zo' enn sin, ass den Errol Flynn net me' ze halen.
translation.en: As soon as the work in the studio is nearly finished, Errol Flynn can't be stopped.

translation.lb: Vu senger vagabunde-jugend huet en d'ie'ft zum wâsser behalen.
translation.en: From his vagabond youth, he has kept a deep connection to the water.

translation.lb: Eso' wor et och no der réalisatio'n vun „ESCAPE ME NEVER" mam Ida Lupin o.
translation.en: It was the same after the completion of "ESCAPE ME NEVER" with Ida Lupino.

translation.lb: Fir de moment gondelt en irgendwo' lânscht d'californeseh kiist.
translation.en: At the moment, he is sailing somewhere along the Californian coast.

translation.lb: Fir „CRY WOLF" ze dre'ne kënnt en an d'atelier'en zréck.
translation.en: For filming "CRY WOLF," he will return to the studios.

translation.lb: Durno denkt en op démselwechte schëff „Le Zeca" den tour em d'welt ze mächen.
translation.en: Afterward, he is considering making a world tour on the same ship, 'Le Zeca.'

translation.lb: Ei sin der nach vill, de net wëssen — datt den hellege Willibrord Haut nach an démselwechte stésarg (net de sarcophage) leit we' am joer 739.
translation.en: There are still many who do not know — that Saint Willibrord lies today in the same stone coffin (not the sarcophagus) as in the year 739.

translation.lb: — datt de grof Siegfried vu Letzeburg d'abtei vun Iéchternach nés o.p d'he'cbt bruecht huet.
translation.en: — that Count Siegfried of Luxembourg restored the Abbey of Echternach.

translation.lb: — datt de konschtatelier vun der Iéchternacher abtei eng zeit dé bèschte vun Europa wor.
translation.en: — that the art workshop of the Echternach Abbey was once the best in Europe.

translation.lb: — datt de Jang de Biannen der stad Iéchternach fënnef mol e besuch gemàch huet.
translation.en: — that Jang from Biannen visited the city of Echternach five times.

translation.lb: — datt d'Maximiliansklack keng 70, mé nuren 58 zenner schwe'er wor (si ass durch d'Rndstedt offensiv zerste'ert gin a get nés nei gegoss).
translation.en: — that the Maximilian's bell weighed not 70, but only 58 hundredweight (it was destroyed during the Rundstedt offensive and will be recast anew).

translation.lb: — datt bis zur franse'scher Revolution dem hellege Sebastian sei kapp zu Iéchternach opbewahrt go'f an immens vi 11 pilger vu weithir hién dohi vere'ere ko'men (duerfir d'St. Sebastiansprozessio'n).
translation.en: — that until the French Revolution the head of Saint Sebastian was kept in Echternach and countless pilgrims from afar came there to venerate it (hence the St. Sebastian procession).

translation.lb: — datt de kinnek Jak II vun England 1697 incognito no Iéchternach ko'm.
translation.en: — that King James II of England came incognito to Echternach in 1697.

translation.lb: — datt nuren eng ke'er e gebirtegen Iéchternacher abt vum Willibrordusklo'schter wor (de Math. Hartz).
translation.en: — that only once was a native of Echternach an abbot of the Willibrord monastery (Math. Hartz).

translation.lb: De revide’erten armistice matt Italien * No der zeidong „L'Italia" setzt sech dé neien armistice matt Italien aus enger préambel an aus 12 artikelen zesummen.
translation.en: The revised armistice with Italy * According to the newspaper 'L'Italia', the new armistice with Italy is composed of a preamble and 12 articles.

translation.lb: An der préambel gin d'tatsâchen duergeluegt, de' d'allie'ert gro'ssmächten derzo' gefo'- ert hun, den armistice matt Italien ofzeänneren;
translation.en: In the preamble, the facts are presented which have compelled the allied great powers to agree on the armistice with Italy;

translation.lb: d'astellong vun den hostilite'ten, den italienesche krichsbeitrag ge'nt d'Preisen, d'tatsäch, datt verschidde klauseien vum armistice, dén elo nach a kr&ft ass, iwerholl sin a schliesslech d'italienesch demande, den armistice ofzeämveren.
translation.en: the cessation of hostilities, the Italian military contribution against the Prussians, the fact that certain clauses of the armistice, which is still in force now, are maintained and finally the Italian demand to conclude the armistice.

translation.lb: Niéwt verschidden aner änneronge vu niewesächlecher fcedeitong geseit den Artikel 3 d'ofschafong vun • der allie'erter controllcommissio'n an Italie vir.
translation.en: Alongside various other changes of secondary importance, Article 3 provides for the abolition of the allied control commission in Italy.

translation.lb: Am Paragraph a) dervun get eng spezialsectio'n vum allie'erten haptquarte'er virgeschloen, de' d'italienesch arme'en an d'krichsproductio'n dirige'eren a controlle'ere soll.
translation.en: In Paragraph a), a special section of the allied headquarters is proposed to direct and control the Italian armies and war production.

translation.lb: De Paragraph b) le'sst d'italienesch flott weider ënnert allie'ertem commando stoen an de par.
translation.en: Paragraph b) allows the Italian fleet to remain under allied command and in par.

translation.lb: c) le'sst d'regironge vu Venetia Julia a vun der provënz Udine weider an hirem amt, Jus datt dé neien armistice ënnërzéehenl ass.
translation.en: c) allows the governments of Veneto Julia and the province of Udine to continue in their office until the new armistice is signed.

translation.lb: Wichteg ass och den artikel 6, no dém de' 4 gro'ssmächten sech verpflichten, all italienesch krichsgefängener, de' nach an hiren hänn sin, eso' schnell we' me'glech ze rapatrie'eren.
translation.en: Important is also article 6, according to which the 4 great powers commit to repatriate all Italian prisoners of war still in their hands as quickly as possible.

translation.lb: Den art. 7 oblige'ert Italien, keng actio'nen z'ënnerhuelen, de' den intressen vun den allie'erte schuede kënnten.
translation.en: Article 7 obligates Italy not to undertake any actions that could harm the interests of the allies.

translation.lb: Am art. 8 verpflicht Italien sech, krichsverbriécher vu fre'ere feindmächten hëllefen opzesiehen.
translation.en: In Article 8, Italy commits to help extradite war criminals from former enemy powers.

translation.lb: Datselwecht gëlt fir d'preisescht guddha-, ben, wat nach am land ass. (art. 9).
translation.en: The same applies to Prussian goods that are still in the country. (Article 9).

translation.lb: Den art. 11 prézise'ert, datt dé neien armistice net d'ausschle'ssong vun eventuelle revendicatio'nen vun allie'erte natio'nen bedeite ge'f.
translation.en: Article 11 specifies that the new armistice does not exclude potential claims by allied nations.

translation.lb: Den italieneschen ausseminister huet gëschter d'ponkte vun dém neien armistice matt Italien confirme'ert.
translation.en: The Italian foreign minister confirmed yesterday the points of the new armistice with Italy.

translation.lb: Pompjésfest Heischend.
translation.en: Fire Brigade Festival in Heischend.

translation.lb: — Fir d'e'scht nés eng kc'er no länge jocre vu schmod a léd go'f hei hei ons d'cantonalpompjésfest gefeiert.
translation.en: — For the first time in many years, after hardship and suffering, our cantonal fire brigade festival was celebrated here.

translation.lb: De' art vu feieren, de' secli all joer widerhuel hun — ofwiésselnd a verschidden uertschaften — wor fre'er a'll ke'er en ©régnes a konnten aus onsem landliêwe net ewechgeduecht gin.
translation.en: The way of celebrating, which they repeated each year — alternating in different localities — was once a regular occurrence and could not be imagined away from our rural life.

translation.lb: Muencheré vun der aler garde wor ducrfir bestëmmt duebet fro', op dem e'schten friddcnsrendez-vons derbei kennen ze sin an alléguer hun si ower och stolz hir verdéngten décora lio'nen als hetzeburger pompjée gedroen.
translation.en: Some from the old guard were determined to be part of the first peace meeting and all of them proudly wore their well-deserved decorations as Luxembourgish firefighters.

translation.lb: D'réceplio'n vun déne ville gesellschaftè wor, we' et hei <ie gebrauch ass, offen an hèrzlech.
translation.en: The reception of the many societies was, as is customary here, open and heartfelt.

translation.lb: En imposante cortège go'f em drei auer vun der m usekge Seilschaft von Esch- Sauer durch d'duerf gefo'ert an op der gro'sser plaz, wo' vit! virwëtzeger sech afond hâlen, buet de président vum Wëltzer canton, den hèr Klein P., eng kieng usprôch gehalen, an dèr hie gleich ufanks ervirgehuewen huet, we' f r b' de gesamte pompjéscorps war, al traditio'ne nés opzehuelen a no batterer zeit sech frr d'e'scht nés hei ze treffen.
translation.en: A grand procession was led at three o'clock by the musical group from Esch-Sauer through the village and on the large square, where many curious people had gathered, the president of the Wëltzer canton, Mr. Klein P., made a small speech, in which he immediately highlighted how important it was for the entire fire brigade corps to revive old traditions and, after difficult times, to meet here again for the first time.

translation.lb: De riédner huet dann op de' mess'lech situatio'n vu muencher corps higewisen, dénch alles i'élt, d'gêschir an d'uniform.
translation.en: The speaker then pointed out the dire situation of some corps, which lack everything, equipment and uniforms.

translation.lb: Hei ze hël- Jefen, eso' sot de président, war sënn an zill vun der assemblée vun haut.
translation.en: Helping here, as the president said, was the purpose and goal of today's assembly.

translation.lb: Den hèr Klein huet dann ofschle'ssend all déne merci gesot de' gehPllef hun, d'fest ze verschö neren a ganz besonnesch den Heischenter médercher an der znusek vun Esch-Sauer.
translation.en: Mr. Klein then finally thanked all those who helped to beautify the festival and especially the young women from Heischend and the music from Esch-Sauer.

translation.lb: Uschle'ssend go'wen e we'ncg übonge gemäch enner matthëllef vun den Ettelbréckcr pompjéen.
translation.en: Subsequently, some exercises were performed with the assistance of the Ettelbruck firefighters.

translation.lb: An der assemblée go'wen dann organisatio'nsfroe besprach an enner anerem fir de nexte rendez-vous (1947) Eschduerf bezéchent
translation.en: In the assembly, organizational questions were then discussed, and among other things, Eschduerf was designated for the next meeting (1947).

translation.lb: No der feier hun sech dann ons fo' ss. balléquipe matt der Esch-Sauerer équipe getraff.
translation.en: After the celebration, our football team met with the Esch-Sauer team.

translation.lb: Eis Escher frënn hun dobei verdengt gewonn.
translation.en: Our friends from Esch deservedly won.

translation.lb: Splitterfreit glas Zënter geraumer zeit verwennen d'Amerikaner eng speziell art vu splitterfreiem glas, besonnesch fir d'autosindustrie.
translation.en: Shatterproof glass For quite some time now, Americans have been using a special kind of shatterproof glass, especially for the automotive industry.

translation.lb: Dest glas héscht matt sengem wëssenschaftleche numm „plyvinyl".
translation.en: This glass is called by its scientific name "plyvinyl."

translation.lb: Seng haptégeschaft bestét an senger élasticite't.
translation.en: Its main property consists of its elasticity.

translation.lb: Et go'f an de laboratorie vun enger gro'sser planzong zu Toledo (Ohio) entwëckelt.
translation.en: It was developed in the laboratories of a large plant in Toledo, Ohio.

translation.lb: Elo huet den Dupont-Nemour- Konzern eng nei art vu splitterfreiem glas erfond.
translation.en: Now the Dupont-Nemour company has invented a new type of shatterproof glass.

translation.lb: de' all ähnlech produkter, de' bis elo bestanen hun, nach iwertrëfft.
translation.en: that surpasses all similar products that have existed until now.

translation.lb: Des nei matière kann eso'guer matt engem hummer bearbecht gin, o'ni a stécker ze fueren, et get héxtens vexbe't.
translation.en: This new material can even be worked with a hammer without breaking into pieces, it becomes only slightly scratched.

translation.lb: D'amerikanesch industrie beabsichtegt, matt dem neie produkt autoskarosserien hirzestellen.
translation.en: The American industry intends to manufacture car bodies with the new product.

translation.lb: D’Margaret O’Brien „Pin up girl”
translation.en: Margaret O'Brien "Pin up girl"

translation.lb: An enger dre'paus schenkt d'Margaret sengem gro'sse frënd a partenaire aus „Tenth Avenue Angel", dem George Murphy, en egenhänncg gcmolte portrait vu sech.
translation.en: In a break, Margaret gives her great friend and partner from "Tenth Avenue Angel", George Murphy, a self-painted portrait of herself.

translation.lb: Wc' de Murphy sech d'bild ukuckt, ass e platt.
translation.en: When Murphy looks at the picture, he's astonished.

translation.lb: Vun dem klengc Margaret keng spur.
translation.en: Not a trace of little Margaret.

translation.lb: En huet e richtegt Pin-up-girl viru sech.
translation.en: He has a real pin-up girl in front of him.

translation.lb: E ka sech net enthalen a sét zo' senger Partnerin: Ma mei klengen, dat do gleicht dir ower och net de' bo'n.
translation.en: He can't resist and says to his partner: But my dear, that doesn't look like you at all.

translation.lb: „Et ass jo och net, we' ech sin", äntwert de' kleng gro'ss vedette, „ma we' ech gi well!"
translation.en: "It's not how I am," answers the little big star, "but how I want to be!"

translation.lb: Den 12. september... El miérkt en elo sciions oft, we' de Francis eppes matt iwerléong mèteht.
translation.en: On September 12th... He often noticed now that Francis was up to something.

translation.lb: De ■nuergen Ii net en e richtete Babelsturem op e Stull gebaut.
translation.en: The next morning, he had built a tower of Babel upon a chair.

translation.lb: Dat war net eso' einlach, et huet an allen ecke gewackelt, an ass me' we' eng ke'er crem an d'bréch gângen.
translation.en: That wasn't so simple, it wobbled at every corner and collapsed more than once.

translation.lb: Awer „nur die Ruhe
translation.en: But "just stay calm"

translation.lb: huet de Francis geduecht, an huet ail ke'er crem vu vir »gefangen, bis eu e sche'ncn -lurem elo stoen hât.
translation.en: Francis thought, and caught every fall anew until he had a beautiful tower standing.

translation.lb: Ennc wor eng kuchepa'n, dran: e bail, e gummis-de'erchen, e lèfTel, pobeier, e stopp an eng klâm fir d'wäscl) opzebänkeu.
translation.en: At the bottom was a kitchen pan containing: a ball, a rubber duck, a spoon, paper, a stopper, and a peg for hanging laundry.

translation.lb: Fir d'zwét étage liât en: en iiffcheu, e pliischen lioiul, e pèrdehen, eng toile-cirés in t an eng këscbl malt allerband gesammelten Zwiebacks a pobcier-grimmelen.
translation.en: For the second floor he had: a lid, a plush dog, a little horse, an oilcloth bag, and a box with all kinds of collected rusks and paper crumbs.

translation.lb: We' e fèrdeg wor, huet e sei wiérk nieglechst stolz bewounert, a we' de papa en ere'scht gelucwt huet, do war en ausser sech vu fred.
translation.en: When he was finished, he proudly admired his work, and when his father praised him, he was overjoyed.

translation.lb: Vus lauter dankbarkét krut en do ower oeb stéck fir steck beim ofbaueu vun dem krap|)ert bruecht.
translation.en: Out of sheer gratitude, he ended up dismantling the tower bit by bit.

translation.lb: Primizfeier De'fferdeng. — E sonndeg, den 21. juli, go'f hei zu De'fferdeng d'priiniz vum IIw. her Marcel Schneider gefeiert.
translation.en: First Mass Celebration Differdange. — On Sunday, July 21st, here in Differdange, the first mass of Rev. Marcel Schneider was celebrated.

translation.lb: Sclio samschdes owes go'f d'feier durch e concert vun der stadmusek ënnert der directio n vum lier Camille Roilgcn, dé vun de villen erschéngene leidd stärk applaude'ert go'f.
translation.en: Already on Saturday evening, the celebration was opened by a concert from the city music under the direction of Mr. Camille Roiligen, who was strongly applauded by the many people present.

translation.lb: Sonndes mueres wor d'Alois Kayserströss, wo' d'elternhaus vum hèr Schneider stét, c mir vu fuendelen, blummen, an dennegréngs.
translation.en: On Sunday morning, the Alois Kayser Street, where Mr. Schneider’s parental home is located, was beautifully decorated with flags, flowers, and evergreens.

translation.lb: Ennert de klang vun engem primizlidd, gesonge vum Cäcilieverein, huet d'schwësler vu senger mamm, de' am krich gestuerwen ass, den e'erendag vun liirern jong net me' erliéwe könnt, de weisse ro'sckranz op d'boer gedréckt.
translation.en: Amidst the sound of a first mass hymn sung by the Cecilian Choir, the sisters of his mother, who died during the war and couldn’t witness the honorary day of her son, placed the white rosary on the pew.

translation.lb: Am cortège vun de katli. vereiner matt de pompjéen an der stadmusek un der spëtzt go'f de primiziant durch d'festicch garnc'ort strôssen, de' vu ville leidd emsémt woren, an d'kirch gefo'erl, wo' eu a feierlecher weis seng e'scht mëss gehalen huet.
translation.en: In the procession of the Catholic associations with firefighters and the city music at the forefront, the new priest was led through the festively adorned streets, crowded with many people, to the church, where he held his first mass in a solemn manner.

translation.lb: De' gro ss popularite't ass besonnesch durch den emsland ze verstoen, datt den hèr Schneider wärend dem krich, ënnert der nazityrannci, actif an der resistenz täteg wor.
translation.en: The great popularity is mainly understood by the fact that Mr. Schneider was actively involved in the resistance during the war, under the Nazi tyranny.

translation.lb: Mnench refractaire wësse vu senger hëllefsbcrélschaft a seligem entschlossenen handien e liddehen ze sangen,
translation.en: Many defiant ones know of his helpfulness and his blessed determined actions a little song to sing,

translation.lb: a muench politesche fliichtleng huet dem hèr Schneider e sécheren asyl ze verdanke gehât.
translation.en: and many political refugees owe Mr. Schneider a safe asylum.

translation.lb: Nomëttes go'f dem primiziant vu seite vun der gemeng eng hèrzlech ovatio'n duerbruecht.
translation.en: In the afternoon, the new priest received a heartfelt ovation from the community.

translation.lb: E vertriéder vun der jugend begre'sst den hèr Schneider, wïnscht him a sengem zo'kënftegen wirkongskrés vill gléck.
translation.en: A representative of the youth greeted Mr. Schneider, wishing him much happiness in his future area of work.

translation.lb: an offre'ert him am numm vun der populatio'n eng sehe' büroarichtong.
translation.en: and offered him a new office setup in the name of the population.

translation.lb: Den hèr paschlo'er sét den De'fferdcnger merci fir hir tatkräfteg'ëllef a get dem primiziant de' bèschte glcckv '"scli mall <;> de wé.
translation.en: Mr. Pastor thanked the people of Differdange for their active help and wished the new priest the best of luck on his way.

translation.lb: De'f gerc erl ergreift dann den her Schneider d'wuerl.
translation.en: Finally, Mr. Schneider took the word.

translation.lb: E sét allen, de' zu sengem e'erendag uialtgehollef hun en dc'we merci a niengl, dalt en dal fest hei, an de' De'fferdenger nimols vergiésse gc'f.
translation.en: He thanked everyone who helped on his honorary day and promised never to forget this celebration and the people of Differdange.

translation.lb: Malt dem ofsange vun der „Hémecht" huel de sche'n an androcksvoll primizfeier en enn fond.
translation.en: With the singing of the 'Hémecht', the beautiful and impressive first mass celebration came to an end.

translation.lb: Ké referendum fir de Leopold III.
translation.en: No referendum for Leopold III.

translation.lb: * Virgëschter liuet de belsche Premierminister Van Acker bekannten, datt d'belsch regirong de virschlag vum kinek Leopold, sei retour vun enger volleksofstëmmong ofhängeg ze mächen, ofgelént huet.
translation.en: * The day before yesterday, Belgian Prime Minister Van Acker announced that the Belgian government rejected King Leopold's proposal to make his return dependent on a referendum.

translation.lb: Nom virschlag vum kinek sollt des ofstëmmong no den allgemenge wählen, d. h. nom 17. februar, durchgefe'ert gin.
translation.en: According to the king's proposal, this vote was supposed to take place after the general elections, i.e., after February 17.

translation.lb: Ail belsch Parteien, matt ausnahm vun enger, solle matt desem entschéd vun der regirong averstane sin.
translation.en: All Belgian parties, with the exception of one, are said to agree with this decision of the government.

translation.lb: D'regirong huet erklärt, datt eng agitatio'n vrun de wählen vun dèr zort net derzo' beidroe ge'w, fir de fridden an d'énegkét ze hiéwen.
translation.en: The government stated that agitation of this kind before the elections would not contribute to promoting peace and unity.

translation.lb: De kinek huet der beischer regirong weider propose'ert, hir ménong iwert dese problem gleichzeiteg matt senger üntwert ze publize'eren.
translation.en: The king further proposed to the Belgian government to publish their opinion on this issue simultaneously with his response.

translation.lb: Van den Bergh president vum amerikanesche senat Washington.
translation.en: Van den Bergh president of the American senate Washington.

translation.lb: — De nei gewielten araerikanesche senat. an dem d'republikanesch partei d'majorite't huet, huet de republikanesche Senator Van d* Bergh zum. présidant vum Senat gewieit.
translation.en: — The newly elected American senate, in which the Republican party has the majority, has elected the Republican Senator Van den Bergh as president of the Senate.

translation.lb: Normalerweis häct desc poste misstc vum vize-president vun den U. S. A. besät gin.
translation.en: Normally, this position would have been occupied by the vice-president of the U.S.A.

translation.lb: Seitdem de président Roosevelt awer do't ass, get et an Amerika momentan ké vize-president.
translation.en: However, since President Roosevelt has passed, there is currently no vice-president in America.

translation.lb: Ennert der regirong Roosevelt wor de jetzege président Truman vize-president.
translation.en: Under the Roosevelt administration, the current president Truman was vice-president.

translation.lb: De Senator Van den Bergh huet als republikanesche vertrieder un déne méschten internationale confercnzen am leschte joer dé lg ehe 1.
translation.en: Senator Van den Bergh has participated as a Republican representative in most of the international conferences in the past year.

translation.lb: Trotzdem hie politeschc ge'gncr vum Byrnes ass.
translation.en: Despite being a political opponent of Byrnes.

translation.lb: hun de' zwe'n op dese conferenzen zesummegeschafft.
translation.en: the two have worked together at these conferences.

translation.lb: A politesche kréser get dermatt gerechent, datt an der e'schter setzong vum amerikanesche congress d'fro vun der erlichterter awanderong an d'U. S. A. zur spröch komme wert.
translation.en: In political circles, it is expected that in the first session of the American congress the question of facilitated immigration to the U.S.A. will be discussed.

translation.lb: Budgetvirlag fir 1947 D'recette stin dran matt ronn 2054 mî'llio'ne frang.
translation.en: Budget proposal for 1947: The revenue amounts to around 2054 million francs.

translation.lb: Dovu sin 750 millîo'nen „ausserordentliche Einnahmen".
translation.en: Of that, 750 million are 'extraordinary income'.

translation.lb: Mé de' eventuell reparatio'nen an de friémen emprunt ai nach net derbei.
translation.en: But the possible reparations and foreign loans are not yet included.

translation.lb: Dépensent 2630 millio'ne frang, Dovun ass d'halachecht „ausserordentliche Ausgaben".
translation.en: Expenditures are 2630 million francs, half of which are 'extraordinary expenses'.

translation.lb: „Die Deckung dieser Ausgaben wird sowohl durch im In- sowie Im Auslande aufzunehmende Anleihen, durch die Kapitalsteuer und durch die Einnahmen herrührend aus Reparationen vonseiten Deutschlands sichergestellt" (L. W. 23. dec.)
translation.en: "The coverage of these expenses will be secured by taking loans both domestically and abroad, through the capital tax and through income from reparations from Germany" (L. W. 23rd Dec.)

translation.lb: Besonnesch beim lèschte ponkt dèrf é skeptesch sin.
translation.en: One may be particularly skeptical about the last point.

translation.lb: Et héscht zwar, mir ge'we fir eng haJlef millio'n mark machinnen aus Deitschland kre'en.
translation.en: It is indeed said that we will receive machines worth half a million marks from Germany.

translation.lb: Owex wc'uiî Och o gewësse prozentsâtz vuim kok aus dem Ruhrgebidd gêt op de bonto vun de repara tio'nen.
translation.en: Moreover, a certain percentage of coke from the Ruhr area is supposed to go towards the account of reparations.

translation.lb: Da sollen och „die feindlichen Güter" liquide'ert gin.
translation.en: Then 'enemy assets' are also supposed to be liquidated.

translation.lb: Dat héscht also, datt den Sequester emol ufänkt, seng gro'ss wueren ze verkafen.
translation.en: That means that the sequestrator begins to sell his large goods.

translation.lb: Fir de krichsschued ze bczuelen, go'wen am joer 1946 1J milliarden opgebraucht, eng gawalteg zomm.
translation.en: To pay for the war damage, 1.5 billion were spent in 1946, a tremendous sum.

translation.lb: Am joer 1947 soll och d'subsidiepoiitik nach weidepgoen.
translation.en: In the year 1947, the subsidy policy is also supposed to continue.

translation.lb: 200 millio'ne frang soll on d'bauere bezuelt gin.
translation.en: 200 million francs are supposed to be paid to the farmers.

translation.lb: Do so clo emol nach én. d'steiere ge'wen all an d'gehälter fle'en.
translation.en: Someone might say that all taxes go towards salaries.

translation.lb: Wa gespuert soll gin, dann hoffenb lech op der richtiger plaz.
translation.en: If savings are to be made, then hopefully in the right place.

translation.lb: Wellt Russland en deitsche féderalstaat?
translation.en: Does Russia want a German federal state?

translation.lb: Berlin. — No gerüchter, de' zu Berlin zirkule'eren, soll Russland wëlles hun, d'aHSscministerconferenz, de' am märz zu Moskau stattfanne soll, matt éngem projet, no dim Deitschland- zu engem fed-eralstaat gemäch.soll gin, z'i^'erraschen.
translation.en: Berlin. — According to rumors circulating in Berlin, Russia supposedly intends to surprise the foreign ministers' conference, which is to take place in March in Moscow, with a project proposing that Germany becomes a federal state.

translation.lb: De' kirzlech instructio'nen, de' d'Russen den deiteche localautorite'te gin hun, fir staatsverfassongen auszeschaffen, gin als e'scht mesure zur verwirklechong vun desem zill opgeholl.
translation.en: The recent instructions that the Russians have given to the German local authorities to draft constitutions are seen as the first measure towards achieving this goal.

translation.lb: Bis elo schengen d'Russen enger deitscher zentralisc'erter regfrong gënschtcg gewiéscht ze sin,
translation.en: Until now, the Russians seemed to have favored a centralized German government,

translation.lb: „All owens e mord“ Zenter e puer dég liewt d'bevëlkcrong vu Ferrare a berechtegter opregong.
translation.en: "Every evening a murder" For a few days now, the population of Ferrara lives in justified agitation.

translation.lb: All dag gét nämlech durch e geheimsender d'noricht.
translation.en: Every day, a secret transmitter gives the message.

translation.lb: et ge'w elo all owens e mënsch do't gemat gin.
translation.en: It is said that every evening, a person was killed.

translation.lb: Tatsächlech go'wen zwe' baueren vu Nizzana cnner mysteriösen emstänn ermuerd.
translation.en: Indeed, two farmers from Nizzana were murdered under mysterious circumstances.

translation.lb: Zwe'n cyclisten hun den Dr. Baroncelli crschoss a konnten onerkannt flüchten.
translation.en: Two cyclists shot Dr. Baroncelli and managed to flee unidentified.

translation.lb: D'opregong ass se'er gro'ss.
translation.en: The excitement is very great.

translation.lb: besonncsch well d'ustrengonge vun der polizei o'ni résultat bleiwen.
translation.en: Especially since the efforts of the police remain without result.

translation.lb: Et get ugeholl, datt d'bcweggrenn-vun desen attentater op politeschem gebidd ze siehe sin.
translation.en: It is assumed that the motives of these attackers are to be seen in the political field.

translation.lb: Et ass net ausgeschloss, datt et scch cm Partisanen handelt, de' matt der cpuratio'n onzefridde sin an clo sclwer Justiz mache wellen.
translation.en: It is not excluded that it involves partisans who are dissatisfied with the situation and want to take justice into their own hands.

translation.lb: D’fliegerongleck bei Gander
translation.en: The plane crash near Gander

translation.lb: New York, 24. sept. — Autorise'ert amcrikanesch pcrse'nlechkéten hu bekannten, datt d'amerikanesch autorite'te net un der enquête iwer d'fliegerongleck bei Gander délhuelen, datt »i awer, wann et gewénacht ge'f gin, matt rotschle' hëllefe ge'wen.
translation.en: New York, September 24th. — Authorized American individuals have stated that the American authorities are not participating in the investigation of the plane crash near Gander, but they will help with advice if it is requested.

translation.lb: De spezialcorrespondent vum * „Daily Mail" huet senger zeidong gekabelt, datt et beim flicgerongléck vu Gander e goheimnes ge'f i gin.
translation.en: The special correspondent of the * 'Daily Mail' has wired his newspaper that there seems to be a mystery surrounding the plane crash at Gander.

translation.lb: An den trümmer vum avion ass nämicch eng leich entdeckt gin, de' net identifize'ert könnt'gin.
translation.en: Among the wreckage of the plane, a body was found that could not be identified.

translation.lb: De geheimnosvollen do'degcn, dé ké pasl. ké geld an iwerhapt keng pabeiere bei sech hât, wor den iwerliéwendo vollkommen onbekannt.
translation.en: The mysterious deceased, who had no passport, no money, and indeed no papers on them, was completely unknown to the survivor.

translation.lb: E vun den expert'en, de' d'enquête iwer d'ongléck fe'eren, huet erklärt, datt, wanji d'ursâch vum ongléck festgestallt kennt gin, si net vlrun 30 dég publize'ert ge'f gin.
translation.en: One of the experts conducting the investigation of the accident has stated that when the cause of the accident is determined, it will not be published for 30 days.

translation.lb: Et schéngt awer schon elo festzéstoen, datt den apparat am moment, wo' en eng schléf gezun huet fir ze landen, an dém moment gc'nt en hiwel gerannt ass.
translation.en: However, it already seems certain that the aircraft hit a hill at the moment it made a circuit to land.

translation.lb: De flieger wor ongefe'er an der he'cht vu 700 meter, mé we'nt der schlechter sieht hätt en onbedengt an der he'cht vun 1300 meter misse »in.
translation.en: The plane was approximately at an altitude of 700 meters, but due to poor visibility, it absolutely should have been at an altitude of 1300 meters.

translation.lb: Eso'bal we' e flieger matt der buedemstatio'n a contact trëtt, stellt der Chefpilot sein altimeter an.
translation.en: As soon as a plane makes contact with the ground station, the chief pilot adjusts his altimeter.

translation.lb: D'indicatio'nen, de' hié vun der buedemstatio'n vu Gander krut, go'wen an englescher sprOch gemäch, so'datt ugeholl ka gin, datt de capitaine, obsehon hié läng an der RAF activ wor, sc falsch verstauen huet a sein altimeter op eng verke'ert he'cht agestallt huet.
translation.en: The indications he received from the ground station at Gander were made in English, so it can be assumed that the captain, even though he was active in the RAF for a long time, misunderstood and set his altimeter to an incorrect altitude.

translation.lb: Des hypothés ge'f d'ursâch erklären, fir wat de flieger relativ niddreg gefiun ass.
translation.en: This hypothesis would explain why the plane was flying relatively low.

translation.lb: Eng aner ursâch kann och de' sin, datt d'mannschaft duerch dat schlecht wléder aussergewe'nlech midd wor.
translation.en: Another reason could be that the crew was exceptionally tired due to the bad weather.

translation.en: In general, crossing the Atlantic from east to west is always more difficult than in the opposite direction.

translation.en: In any case, the initial indications from the investigation suggest that the cause will never be precisely determined.

translation.en: A grave was dug at the crash site where the 26 victims were buried on Wednesday.

translation.en: The church service is held in airplanes that constantly circle over the crash site. Before that, a requiem takes place in the chapel of the Gander aerodrome.

translation.en: Here we inform all interested parties that the Klöcker Hans, known as "Glöckner," was a Gestapo member in Luxembourg from July 7, 1941, to November 30, 1942.

translation.en: Every Luxembourger who had dealings with the "Glöckner" during his "term of office" is hereby requested to submit their written complaint to the nearest police station or to the office of the Union Dudelange in room No. 7 at the town hall.

translation.lb: huel en zaldot um eck ugesto'ss,
translation.en: hit a soldier standing at the corner,

translation.lb: an ass de Grunnerbierg crofgefuer, wo' e ge'nt enger maucr gestoppt gin ass.
translation.en: and drove down the Grundberg where it was stopped by a wall.

translation.lb: TVpolizei huet gleich de fall ënaersichl.
translation.en: The police immediately began investigating the incident.

translation.lb: Mutwëllege schued an onnëtz käschten
translation.en: Malicious damage and unnecessary costs

translation.lb: A mengem haus ass de giéivel an d'hënnescht face ganz voller réss.
translation.en: In my house, the plaster and the back façade are full of cracks.

translation.lb: D'haus war nämleeh gestückelt gin.
translation.en: The house had been plastered after all.

translation.lb: Am october 44 hât ech den architect gefrot, fir et selwer machen ze lôssen, ech hätt arbechter fond, de' et gleich gemâch hätten.
translation.en: In October '44, I asked the architect to let it be done myself, as I had found workers who would have done it immediately.

translation.lb: Den hèr sot nén, dat gét net.
translation.en: The gentleman said no, that won't work.

translation.lb: Am februar 45 ko'me si de' nâss mauere kucken a fannen, datt et muss gemâch gin, eso'bâl d'wiéder sehe' get.
translation.en: In February '45, they came to look at the wet walls and found that it had to be done as soon as the weather turned better.

translation.lb: Am september gin ech perse'nlech bei den hèr T. fir eng crlabnes, ech kre'e gesot, ■ ech soll hannert den architcct.
translation.en: In September, I personally went to Mr. T. for a clearance; I was told to consult the architect.

translation.lb: Dén hèr sét mir, si sollen ons a ro' lôssen an hir rechnonge mächen.
translation.en: The gentleman told me they should let us know and make their calculations.

translation.lb: De summer ass ailes gcdréchent an de wanter erem nâss gin.
translation.en: The summer dried everything, and in the winter, it became wet again.

translation.lb: Vir engem mo'nt woren zwé héren hei, de' fond hun, datt de gips och faul ass, an elo wèrd et jo nés fir e joer dobei bleiwen.
translation.en: A month ago, two gentlemen were here, who found that the plaster is also rotten, and now it will likely remain like that for another year.

translation.lb: Net ze rechne matt der arbecht vun dém weissen dreck an den trapen all dag.
translation.en: Not to mention the work caused by the white debris on the stairs every day.

translation.lb: Eeh sin zwar eng fra, me ech hätt gemengt, wann se mech et démols selwer flécke gelôss hätten, da war mein haus elo net nach weider zerste'ert, ech hätt vill roserci, an de Staat vill geld gespucrt.
translation.en: I am indeed a woman, but I would have thought if they had let me repair it myself back then, my house wouldn't be further destroyed now, I would have had much less trouble, and the State would have saved a lot of money.

translation.lb: Vve W.
translation.en: Vve W.
On the 23rd of August, 1943.

translation.lb: Op dem stützponkt, dén ech vu mengem stre'ko'p aus am a hât, blo'w et d'ganz nuecht fo'eg, mé d'Russe waren awer schons derhannert.
translation.en: At the stronghold, which I had in sight from my lookout, it blew throughout the whole night, but the Russians were already behind it.

translation.lb: Mir huet d'sâch scho besser gefall fir nozekucken.
translation.en: I felt better about checking it out.

translation.lb: Ge'nt de mëtteg gong et lass.
translation.en: Around noon, it started.

translation.lb: De' 7 Pd ass gleich ge'lâf an de Russ huet d'frontlinn opgerullt.
translation.en: The 7-pounder quickly went off and the Russians rolled up the front line.

translation.lb: We' de leschte Preiss matt den hänn an der lûcht aus dem stützponkt erausgong, hun ech mech och eso' lues op de wé gemâcli fir mer én anert „quarte'cr" ze sichen, well hei go'f et ongemittlech.
translation.en: When the last German left the stronghold with hands in the air, I slowly made my way to find another 'quarter' since it was getting uncomfortable here.

translation.lb: Em den owend sin ech den autoe vun onser kompanie an d'gräpp gelâf.
translation.en: In the evening, I came across the car of our company.

translation.lb: „Schütze Leick vom Stützpunkt 0,3 zurück, konnte dem Russen entwischen, aMe mussten sich ergeben, hatten keine Munition mehr"...
translation.en: 'Rifleman Leick from stronghold 0.3 fell back, managed to escape the Russians, but had to surrender, had no more ammunition...'.

translation.lb: „Wenn ich Sie sehe Leick, dann weiss ich, dass noch wenigstens einer von der Kompanie lebtl Sie müssen verdammt Schwein haben, wenn ich nicht irre ist es jetzt das achte Mal, dass Sic unter den „letzten Resten" sind." Wann dén alles gevvosst hätt.
translation.en: 'When I see you, Leick, I know at least one from the company is still alive! You must be incredibly lucky; if I'm not mistaken, this is the eighth time you've been among the 'last remaining.' If only he knew everything.

translation.lb: Eng schwe’er gepre’ft famill hëllt hiren higerîchte jong hém De'fferdeng.*
translation.en: A severely burdened family takes their executed son home to Differdange.*

translation.lb: — En donneschdeg, de 9- rné ass erem e jonge Letzeburger, dé sei liéwe fir d'hémecht gelôss huet, an de letzeburger buedem begruewe gin.
translation.en: — On Thursday, the 9th of the month, another young Luxembourger, who gave his life for the homeland, was buried in Luxembourg soil.

translation.lb: Et wo' de Jean-Baptiste Urlh aus der Escherstrôss
translation.en: It was Jean-Baptiste Urth from Escher Street.

translation.lb: D'famiU Urth, dèr seeh d'undôlnahm vu ganz De'fferdeng zo'wend, ass wirklech schwe'er gepre'ft gin.
translation.en: The Urth family, which saw the participation of all of Differdange, has been truly severely burdened.

translation.lb: Kaum 1940 aus der évacuatio'n erem, ass de papp gestuerwen.
translation.en: Hardly back from evacuation in 1940, the father passed away.

translation.lb: Ennert dem naziterror an de' verhâsst preisesch uniform gepresst, huet de J. B. Urth den e'schten urlaub benolzt fir ze déserte'eren.
translation.en: Under Nazi terror and forced into the hated Prussian uniform, J. B. Urth used his first leave to desert.

translation.lb: Vun der resistenz a Frankreich gelét, gong e gleich bei de maquis, bis e vu verkommene verre'der un d'Preisen dénonce'ert an der gestapo ausgeliwert go'f.
translation.en: Guided by the resistance in France, he went straight to the maquis until he was betrayed by depraved traitors to the Prussians and handed over to the Gestapo.

translation.lb: Seng mamm an der hcmecht hât mëttlerweil de' ganz • schwe'er vum naziterror auszedrénkcn a si go'f vun de preiseschen onmënschen ëmgesiedelt.
translation.en: Meanwhile, his mother at home had to endure the full hardship of Nazi terror and was relocated by the Prussian inhumans.

translation.lb: Malt bravoure huet den Urths Jängi, we' e genannt go'f, ail de' schandilechkélen an de preisesche prisongcn erdroen, bis en de 19. September 1944 matt nach 15 aner komeroden zu Dietz an der Lahn sei jonkt bludd ënnert de kugele vun de preiseschen henkerskniéchte versprëtzt huet.
translation.en: With bravery, Urth's Jängi, as he was called, endured all the disgrace in the Prussian prisons, until on September 19, 1944, along with 15 other comrades in Diez an der Lahn, his young blood was spilled under the bullets of the Prussian executioners.

translation.lb: Enner bedélegong vun der populatio'n an de resistenzorganisatio'ne go'f de Jängi zu graw gedroen.
translation.en: Under the participation of the population and resistance organizations, Jängi was laid to rest with honor.

translation.lb: Um kirfecht huet den hèr Nie. Klein, président vun der Unio'n, dem versluerwenen en ergreifende noruff gehal a sét ofschle'ssend, wann et der schwe'er gepre'fter mamm an dem Jängi senge gesëschter en tro'scht ka sin, da wir et den, datt e seng ro' fond huet am hellege ilctzeburger buedem, an datt onser Herrgott seng verdéngschter belo'nt.
translation.en: At the cemetery, Mr. Nie. Klein, president of the Union, gave a moving eulogy to the departed and concluded, if there could be any comfort for the severely burdened mother and Jängi's siblings, it would be that he found his peace in the holy Luxembourg soil, and that our Lord rewards his merits.

translation.lb: Uklo ge ’ nt d ’ englesch regirong * D'englesch regirong huet sech gëschter missen am Parlament ge'nt eng uschëliegong vun der oppositio'n an der fro vun der liéwensmëttelknapphét verdédegen.
translation.en: Complaint against the English government * The English government had to defend itself yesterday in Parliament against a motion from the opposition on the issue of food shortages.

translation.lb: De chef vun der oppositio'n, Eden, huet sech an senger parlamentserklärong ge'nt de' ministère gerîcht, de' de' lescht woeh erklârongen iwer d'iiéwensmëttelkîrzon„en ofgin hâlen.
translation.en: The leader of the opposition, Eden, in his parliamentary statement, directed his speech against the ministry, which recently made statements about continuing food rationings.

translation.lb: Des kirzongen treffen d'englesch bevôlkerong besonnesch schwe'er an d'erkläronge vun d'ministeren hu xveider neischt we' bestirzong ervirgeruff.
translation.en: These rationings particularly harshly affect the English population, and the ministers' statements have only caused further unrest.

translation.lb: Den Eden werft der regirong da vir, si hält et verseimt d'vollek matt zeit ze warr.
translation.en: Eden accuses the government of failing to prepare the people in time.

translation.lb: Mir dèrfen den éscht vun der lag net ënnerschätzen, sot en.
translation.en: We must not underestimate the seriousness of the situation, he said.

translation.lb: 6 läng joren sin elo schons an England d'iiéwensmëttel rationne'ert.
translation.en: For 6 long years now, food has been rationed in England.

translation.lb: Dodurch ass d'lag an England vu verschidden aner länner vum continent verschidden.
translation.en: As a result, the situation in England is different from that in various other countries on the continent.

translation.lb: Deitschland hât z. b. bis zu senger nidderlag alles am iwerfloss, wat et set h aus den occupe'erte länner erausgeschléft hält.
translation.en: Germany, for example, had everything in abundance until its defeat, having taken resources from the occupied countries.

translation.lb: Den ernirongsminister hätt dach onbedengt misse wëssen, datt det joer e gro'ssen ausfall u céréalien komme ge'w an en hätt missen e'schter mesuren derge'nt ergreifen.
translation.en: The Minister of Agriculture should have definitely known that this year there would be a major shortfall in cereals and should have taken measures earlier.

translation.lb: Den ernirongsminister Smith huet sech gewîrt' a gesot, hién hätt d'parlament net am onklore gelôss.
translation.en: Agriculture Minister Smith defended himself and said he had not left Parliament in the dark.

translation.lb: Et wir net ubruecht gewiéscht, d'kirzongen der popu- Iatio'n ze fre' bekanntzegin, well soss d'baueren hir productcn agehalen an d'arbechter d'bäckereie gestirmt hätten.
translation.en: It would not have been appropriate to announce the rationings to the population too early, as otherwise the farmers might have held back their products and the workers might have stormed the bakeries.

translation.lb: An Eurooa müssen 125 millio'ne leidd matt we'neger we' 2000 kalorien den dag auskommen, et get eso'guer länner, wo' se matt manner we' 1000 kalorien pro dag zefridde musse sin.
translation.en: In Europe, 125 million people must get by with less than 2000 calories a day; there are even countries where they must be content with less than 1000 calories per day.

translation.lb: Am iwregen ass d'crise op de' onerwart schlecht recolten a Südafrika, Indien an Amerika zreckzefe'eren.
translation.en: Moreover, the crisis is attributed to unexpectedly poor harvests in South Africa, India, and America.

translation.lb: Amerika huet z. b. seng récolté u wés l'A mil- Iio'nnen tonnen ze he'ch geschat gehat
translation.en: America, for example, had overestimated its wheat harvest by millions of tons.

translation.lb: Zum schluss huet den ernirongsminister da bekannt gin, datt England de verbrauch vu senge liéwensmëttel al aschränke misst.
translation.en: In conclusion, the Agriculture Minister announced that England must now restrict its food consumption further.

translation.lb: AMERIKA D ’streiglag an Amerika entspânt sech * De' 260.000 streikend arbechter vun der fléschkonservc-fabriken hu vun hire gewerk schatten uerder kritt, tyr arbecht erem opzehue- Ien.
translation.en: AMERICA The strike situation in America is expanding. The 260,000 striking workers from the meatpacking factories have been ordered by their unions to resume their work.

translation.lb: Si hun awer dobei erklärt, datt de streik rechtlech nach net zu enn wir.
translation.en: However, they have stated that the strike is not yet legally over.

translation.lb: Vill konseppfabriken si scho vpim i>vprholl gin.

translation.lb: An der automobilindustrie ass et an de wjérkef vum Ford a Chrysler ru enger énegong komm.

translation.lb: drei kompletter geleiscr an der gro'sser gare an zwé an der PH-gare haten se malt ~Heim ins Reich" transportiert.
translation.en: they had transported three complete tracks from the main station and two from the PH-station to the 'Heim ins Reich'.

translation.lb: E provisoreschen sécherhétssystem ass agefo'ert.
translation.en: A provisional safety system has been introduced.

translation.en: If a train is to leave the station, all points must be properly locked and the levers set in the provisional signal box.

translation.lb: Et kann é sech virstellen, wat dat bei dem betrieb e geränns an der gare ass.
translation.en: One can imagine what a hustle this operation is in the station.

translation.en: All trains from Lechternach to Grevenmacher now again go over the Prince Bridge above the station;

translation.lb: dodurcli brauche se de' schlangenbewegongen durch t'ganz gare 'nel inc' ze machen.
translation.en: as a result, they no longer need to make the winding maneuvers through the entire station.

translation.lb: Wann elo och nach all de' gleiser agebaut gin, de' d'Prcisen eis geklaut haten, da gel dodurch vill onnëtz arbecht gespuert.
translation.en: If all the tracks that the Germans had stolen from us are now reinstalled, a lot of unnecessary work will be spared.

translation.en: People took notice and scrutinized the two specimens, until the two German tourists sought refuge in the back door.

translation.en: What would our Belgian, French, Dutch, English, and Danish tourists have thought if, by unfortunate chance, they had made the acquaintance of the girl on a Luxembourgish dance floor?

translation.lb: Tribune libre Ech hätt gèren e puer frôe vun der kommunistescher partei beäntwert:
translation.en: Free Tribune I would like to answer a few questions from the communist party:

translation.lb: 1) Fir wât go'f de genösse Fonck vu Uëmeleng no 3 wochen aus der haft entlôss?
translation.en: 1) Why was comrade Fonck from Uëmeleng released from custody after 3 weeks?

translation.lb: 2) Ass et eng provisoresch oder définitiv haftentlôssong?
translation.en: 2) Is it a provisional or definitive release from custody?

translation.lb: Well bei der verhaftong vum genösse Fonck d'konnnunistesch zeidong „eine baldmöglichste Aufklärung" an deser affaire annonce'ert huet de' bis haut nach net erfollegt ass froenech:
translation.en: Since during the arrest of comrade Fonck the communist newspaper announced "as soon as possible clarification" in this affair that until today has not yet happened, I ask:

translation.lb: 3) Huet dé genösse Fonck matt der iestapo geschafft?
translation.en: 3) Did comrade Fonck work with the Gestapo?

translation.lb: 4) Huet hién vun hir 300—400 RM. Entgeld" pro mo'nt kritt?
translation.en: 4) Did he receive from them 300—400 RM remuneration per month?

translation.lb: Op de' zwo' lescht froen hätt ech èren eng klipp a kloer äntwert: jo der nén.
translation.en: On the last two questions, I would like a straight and clear answer: yes or no.

translation.lb: Falls d'kommunistesch zeilong et virzitt, de' s. z. annonce'ert .Aufklärung" an enger vuu hire nèxte nummeren ze brengen.
translation.en: If the communist newspaper prefers to bring the so-called announced clarification in one of its next issues.

translation.lb: verzichten ech op d'beäntwertong vun de froen 3 a 4.
translation.en: I will refrain from answering questions 3 and 4.

translation.lb: „Epuratio’n“ vum kinnék Léopold Bro'ssel, 20. juni i Renier >
translation.en: "Epuratio'n" of King Leopold Brussels, 20th June in Renier >

translation.lb: De vu m belache kinnék am juli 1940 ageaalen enquêtecommissio'n, dèr hir aufgab et wor, d'polifesèh attitude vuui kinnék I.éopold virun a wiirend dem krich ze pre'fen, luiet bir enquête an engem weissbuch publize'ert.
translation.en: The investigatory commission, established in July 1940 concerning King Leopold's behavior, whose task it was to examine King Leopold's political stance before and during the war, has now published their investigation in a white paper.

translation.lb: U'bchàptongcn, wû'no seeh de kiiuiék Léopold 1940 de Preisen ergin hält, o'ni d'englesch an d't'ranse'sch Allie'ert ze benorichtegen, gi vui\ der enquêtecommissio'n als complet! otiZo'lreffend bezéchent.
translation.en: Allegations that King Leopold in 1940 surrendered to the Germans without informing the English and French Allies are described by the investigatory commission as completely unfounded.

translation.lb: Am weissbuch héscht dt, datt de Leopold am november 1940 den Hitler zu Berchtesgaden opgcsicht liätt, fir zc verbeulteren, dilti repressalien ge'nt d'ltelsch vollck ënnerholl ge'we gin, Well eso' vergellongsmcsüren wore fir de lall vu sengor «cigerong ugedroht gin.
translation.en: The white paper states that Leopold met with Hitler in Berchtesgaden in November 1940 to prevent repressive measures against the Belgian people, as such retaliatory actions were threatened in response to his government.

translation.lb: Leopold hflt sech virdrun '2 mol geweigert mam Hitler zesuinmenzekomiueii.
translation.en: Leopold had previously refused twice to meet with Hitler.

translation.lb: Iwer <len zwéte mariage vum kinnék matt Marie Lilian Bacls den 11. sept. 1041 sét de rapport, de mariage liiitt keng politesch folge kennen hun, well d'fra vum kinnék net kinnegin könnt gin an d'kanncr vnn deser fra keng anspréch op den tro'n baten.
translation.en: Regarding the second marriage of the king with Marie Lilian Baels on 11th September 1941, the report states that the marriage would have no political consequences because the king's wife could not become queen, and the children from this wife would have no claim to the throne.

translation.lb: Zënler senger libération aus preisescher gefAngenschaft am joer 194 à liiill rie kinnék Leopold arn exil geliewt.
translation.en: Since his liberation from German captivity in the year 1945, King Leopold has lived in exile.

translation.lb: D'coinmissio'n weist d'behaptong, wo'no et secli bei seiiger deporte'erong no Deilschland am joer 194 als eng vun de Preise virberét komödie gehandelt hätl. als verlenmdong zréck.
translation.en: The commission rejects the claim that his deportation to Germany in the year 1944 was staged as a German-prepared comedy as slander.

translation.lb: No senger capitulatio'n hält sech de kinnék Leopold geweigert, d'hnltong vun der beischer regirong, de" déinois am Prunkreich wor a versieht huet, malt de Preisen e l'riddensverlrag ofzeschle'ssen, ze beilegen.
translation.en: After his capitulation, King Leopold refused to approve the actions of the Belgian government, which at that time was in France and attempting to negotiate a peace treaty with the Germans.

translation.lb: Wärend der occupatio'!! hätl de kinnék d'attitude vu gewësse politiker an hc'ge fonctionnairen ol'gelént, de »■- wënscht hnn, zu Bre'ssel eng nei regirong ze forme'eren, de' d bclsch regirong zu London ersetze sollt.
translation.en: During the occupation, the king rejected the behavior of certain politicians and high officials who wished him to form a new government in Brussels to replace the Belgian government in London.

translation.lb: De Walter Pidgeon als tennisman.

translation.en: Since Pidgeon was classified as a professional, tennis has been causing all sorts of worries for him.

translation.lb: Et vor e le'ft, schlankt médehen an et huet de Walter gebiéden, dadi eng party tennis matt em ze mächen.
translation.en: She was a lively, slender girl and she asked Walter to play a game of tennis with her.

translation.lb: „Sécher, gèren, sot ons vedette."
translation.en: "Sure, gladly," said our star.

translation.lb: „Ech fèrten nëmmen, datt ecli net un iéch eru kommen, huet dat klengt médehen lamente'ert."
translation.en: "I only fear that I won't match up to you," the little girl lamented.

translation.lb: „Keng angscht" huet de Pidgeon se getre'scht, mir spille jo och nëmmeri."
translation.en: "Don't worry," Pidgeon reassured her, "we're just playing for fun."

translation.lb: „Oh, dir sidd gentil, sot d'joffer,,,de' loscht woeh huet d'Helèn mecli 7—5 geschloen".
translation.en: "Oh, you are kind," said the lady, "the other day, Helen only barely won 7-5."

translation.lb: „Dat gét jo nach", äntwert de Pidgeon.
translation.en: "That's not too bad," replied Pidgeon.

translation.lb: ,,Mé wiéli ass dann dat Helèn?"
translation.en: "But who exactly is this Helen?"

translation.lb: „0, dir kennt et sécher, d'Helene Wille, d'tennischampionne!"

translation.lb: Beschluß, wodurch die Tage der Loosziehung für die Miliz-Aushebung von 1859 festgesetzt werden.
translation.en: Decision by which the days for the draft lottery for the militia recruitment of 1859 are determined.

translation.lb: Luxemburg, den 17. Januar 1859.
translation.en: Luxembourg, January 17, 1859.

translation.lb: D« Ttaatsminister, Präsident der Regierung;
translation.en: The State Minister, President of the Government;

translation.lb: Nach Einsicht der Gesetze über die Miliz;
translation.en: After reviewing the laws regarding the militia;

translation.lb: Beschließ t:
translation.en: Decides:

translation.lb: Art. 1. Die Loosziehung der Milizpflichtigen der Aushebung von 1859 soll an den hierunter bezeichneten Orten und Tagen, um IN Uhr Vormittags, Statt finden:
translation.en: Art. 1. The draft lottery for those obligated to serve in the militia for the recruitment of 1859 shall take place at the locations and on the days specified below, at 11 o'clock in the morning.

translation.lb: Ait. 2. Die Milizpflichtigen der vom Hauptotte des Cantons entferntesten Gemeinde!! sind zur Loosziehun.; zueist zugelassen.
translation.en: Art. 2. The conscripts from the municipality farthest from the canton's main town shall be admitted to the lottery first.

translation.lb: Art. 3. Die Districtscommissäre und die Gemeindeverwaltungen haben, so» weit die Sache sie detrifft, sich nach den Bestimmungen der Art. 74 bis 86 des Gesetzes vom 8. Januar 1817 zu richten.
translation.en: Art. 3. The district commissioners and municipal administrations are to comply, as far as it concerns them, with the provisions of Articles 74 to 86 of the law of January 8, 1817.

translation.lb: Art. 4. Gegenwärtiger Beschluß soll i» allen Gemeinden des Großherzog» thumö bekannt gemacht und angeschlagen werden.
translation.en: Art. 4. The present decision shall be made known and posted in all communities of the Grand Duchy.

translation.lb: O’STERGANK Komm mat op d'Feld!
translation.en: EASTER GIFT Come to the field with me!

translation.lb: A gew mer stöll Deng Hand!
translation.en: And give me secretly your hand!

translation.lb: Mierks Du de Frascht aus Scholla Buedem wäichen?
translation.en: Do you notice the frost leaving the schoolyard ground?

translation.lb: — Ech wor och mol an Trotz ann Hâss verrannt,
translation.en: — I too was once caught up in defiance and hate,

translation.lb: Mä säit's Du mäin, ech ganz dem Fre'jorsbuedem gläichen.
translation.en: But since you're mine, I entirely resemble the spring ground.

translation.lb: Komm, föll Deng Hann an ôtem de'f, ganz de'f!
translation.en: Come, feel your hand and breathe deeply, very deeply!

translation.lb: Hêw Däi Gesicht der Sonn entgént ann hlrem Fonklen!
translation.en: Raise your face to the sun and its sparkles!

translation.lb: Blank we' e Spigel glänzt, wat sckmotzeg wor an dre'f,
translation.en: What was dirty and gloomy now shines bright like a mirror,

translation.lb: All De 1 er drängt zum Licht.
translation.en: All desire pushes towards the light.

translation.lb: — Wien huet net Angst am Donklen?
translation.en: — Who is not afraid in the dark?

translation.lb: Trit lues, ganz lues!
translation.en: Tread slowly, very slowly!

translation.lb: Vir allem gew op d'Blumen uecht!
translation.en: Above all, pay attention to the flowers!

translation.lb: Du wöss, ons Himecht huet de Wanter vill gelidden,
translation.en: You know, our home has suffered much in the winter,

translation.lb: Si stinn ge'nt Btfssegt a ge'nt Näid vrun onse Se'le Wuecht —
translation.en: They stand against malice and envy before our souls' protection —

translation.lb: Wäit mach Däin Härz haut op zum gro'ssen O'sterfridden!
translation.en: Today, open your heart wide to the great Easter peace!

translation.lb: Albert H oefler.
translation.en: Albert Hoefler.

translation.lb: E puer Me'nt sin eriwer.
translation.en: A few months have passed.

translation.lb: Et ass nött alles gàngen, we' mir et geduecht haten.
translation.en: Not everything went as we had thought.

translation.lb: Frech an arrogant Gesichter weise sech eröm op der Strôss, mat engem unverschimte Culot, desèlwechte Moment wo' doiwer ons Leit nach leiden, bludden a stierwen.
translation.en: Bold and arrogant faces show themselves again on the street, with an insolent audacity, at the very moment when our people are still suffering, bleeding, and dying.

translation.lb: Den Neiopbau vum Land könnt nöt vum Fleck, alles bleiwt am âle Gleis vu virum 10. Mé 1940.
translation.en: The reconstruction of the country is not progressing, everything remains on the old track from before May 10, 1940.

translation.lb: Mir fro'en ons op mer de ve'er Jor fir neischt solle gelidden hun.
translation.en: We ask ourselves if we have suffered the past four years for nothing.

translation.lb: Mat neien a schmirzlechen Erfrierungen sti mir op der Schwell vum neie Jor.
translation.en: With new and bitter experiences, we stand at the threshold of the new year.

translation.lb: Datt mir ■ 1945 definitiv Défaite vun der Nazipescht an Befreiong vu ganz Europa erliéwen, dat wösse mir.
translation.en: That in 1945 we will witness the definitive defeat of the Nazi scourge and the liberation of all of Europe, we know that.

translation.lb: 1945 get Musel eröm frei, an domatt ganz Land.
translation.en: In 1945 the Moselle will be free again, and with it the entire country.

translation.lb: 1945 kommen ons Leit an ons Jongen eröm.
translation.en: In 1945 our people and our boys will return.

translation.lb: Mir wollen ons schon elo virberéden, se würdeg z'empfänken, a matt hinnen zesummen de' gro'ß Botz virzehuelen, dé elo jo guer nött viru könnt.
translation.en: We want to prepare already now to receive them with dignity, and together with them conduct the great cleanup, which currently cannot begin.

translation.lb: Am Gedenken un onse Misär, am Gedenken un ons Märtyrer, wolle mer dann mat hinnen zesummen e neit Letzeburg oprlchten, ons Demokratie weider ausbauen a befestegen, al faschistesch Bestriewongen am Keim erstecken.
translation.en: In memory of our misery, in memory of our martyrs, we want to build a new Luxembourg with them, further develop and strengthen our democracy, and nip old fascist aspirations in the bud.

translation.lb: Eso' mache mir ons Pflich als Letzeburger, ower och als Mönschen.
translation.en: Thus, we fulfill our duty as Luxembourgers, but also as human beings.

translation.lb: Eso' höllefe mir och mat um Opbau vun enger neier Welt, an der Jugend sech emanzipe'ert an nött nömmen me' Kano'nefudder ass.
translation.en: In this way, we also contribute to the construction of a new world, in which youth emancipates itself and is no longer just cannon fodder.

translation.lb: Schwe’er Verwonnter Gleich no der Liberatio'n hat d'Ligue sech agesat bei der Regirong, fir de' Jongen, de' eng Spezialbehandlong breichten, direct önner ze brengen.
translation.en: Severely injured Immediately after the liberation, the League advocated with the government to place the boys who needed special treatment directly.

translation.lb: D'Regirong hât och hir Höllef versprach.
translation.en: The government had also promised its assistance.

translation.lb: Elo ass et endlech dem Hèr Majo'er Konsbruck durch seng privat Relatio'- nen réusse'ert,.verschidde Jongen bei d'Amerikaner an e Lazarett ze brengen.
translation.en: Now, Mr. Major Konsbruck has finally succeeded through his private connections in placing some boys with the Americans in a hospital.

translation.lb: Mir soen dem Hèr Konjbruck fir seng Beme'ongen Villmols merci.
translation.en: We express our sincere gratitude to Mr. Konsbruck for his efforts.

translation.lb: D'Amerikaner hun ons ze verstoe gin, datt durch de' Verzögerong, de' elo bei gewösse schwe'ere Fäll agetrueden ass, de' betreffend Jongen definitiv Krüppel bleiwen.
translation.en: The Americans have made us understand that due to the delay that has now occurred in certain serious cases, the boys concerned will remain permanently crippled.

translation.lb: Pat verdanken sl onser Regirong..
translation.en: But we owe this to our government..

translation.lb: Letzeburg huet also crem e pur Staatskröppele weider.
translation.en: Luxembourg thus continues with a few state cripples.

translation.lb: Dat schengt onser Regirong vollständeg egal ze sin; de' pur hoügreg Frangen, de' se fainne gin, ruine'eren de Staat och schliesslech net, an d'Gesondhét vun de Jongen ass Niéwesâch.
translation.en: This seems to be completely indifferent to our government; the few measly francs they receive won't ruin the state in the end, and the health of the boys is a secondary matter.

translation.lb: Et kann awer nach gro'sst Onhél vermidde gin, well nach si vill Jongen do, de' direct fort missten, an et kommen der all Dag me'.
translation.en: Yet the greatest misfortune can still be avoided because there are still many boys who need to be sent away immediately, and more are coming every day.

translation.lb: Soll ons Regirong sech da gur net em si bekömmere wollen?
translation.en: Shouldn't our government want to take care of them at all?

translation.lb: D’Ligue „Ons Jonjen“
translation.en: The League "Our Boys"

translation.lb: Froen DE’ ONS ERRÉCHEN...
translation.en: Questions TO REACH US...

translation.lb: „A MIR ÄNTWEREN!
translation.en: "AND WE ANSWER!

translation.lb: Le’wen M. aus dem Nord.
translation.en: Dear M. from the North.

translation.lb: Ech erlabe mer, dir ganz kuurz ze äntwerten.
translation.en: I allow myself to answer you briefly.

translation.lb: Mäng Piaatz ass och aJt bemässt hei an der Zeitung,
translation.en: My place is also well-measured here in the newspaper,

translation.lb: Ech kann awer nach ömmer mamm beste Wollen n#t mat dir d'accord sen wanns du säh's, dir gingts an all Sprohch dinken de' der schreiwe könnt.
translation.en: I still cannot agree with you with the best intentions when you say, you think in every language you can write.

translation.lb: Gef der emol eng Ki'er me' a probi'er et sclwer aus, da geseis de et.
translation.en: Look again once and try it yourself, then you will see.

translation.lb: Lauster emol gudd.
translation.en: Listen carefully.

translation.lb: Wann ech zu mängem Cousin soen: Ech kommen zo' dir.
translation.en: When I say to my cousin: I come to you.

translation.lb: Dann hun ech vun daitsch op letzeburgesch îwersât,, geldu.
translation.en: Then I have translated from German to Luxembourgish, you know.

translation.lb: Wann ech awer par contraire op daitsch soen: Ich komme bei dich,
translation.en: But if, on the contrary, I say in German: I come to you,

translation.lb: dann hun ech daitsch geschriewen, a letzeburgesch geduecht.
translation.en: then I have written in German, but thought in Luxembourgish.

translation.lb: Eso' we' dat ville Lädden, de' hir Pai op daitsch nozêlen, passi'ert, wann se emol eng Ki'er hirem Cousin an d'lslick schreiwen.
translation.en: That is how it happens to many people who count their wages in German, when they occasionally write to their cousin in Luxembourgish.

translation.lb: Et muss en eng Differenz machen teschent letzeburgesch denken, an, emol durch en hasard oder well en de Moment kenet anert Wurt fent, eng daitscht Wurt gebrauchen.
translation.en: One must make a difference between thinking in Luxembourgish and, sometimes by chance or because one finds no other word at the moment, using a German word.

translation.lb: (Ce qu'il fallait démontrer).
translation.en: (Which needed to be demonstrated).

translation.lb: Wanns du awer nach beim letzeburgesch schraiwen, fir d'ischt op daitsch dinks. dann ass dat traureg,
translation.en: But if you still think in German when writing in Luxembourgish, that is sad,

translation.lb: well da mächs du esu gelungen we' et och ass, dat hei.
translation.en: because then you do it as well as it is here.

translation.lb: Du dinks op letzeburgesch, construi'ers dei Satz op daitsch, an iwersetz en erem op' letzeburgesch.
translation.en: You think in Luxembourgish, construct the sentence in German, and then translate it back to Luxembourgish.

translation.lb: Dat r ws du natîrlech net, ma dat ass esu.
translation.en: Of course, you don't naturally do that, but it is like that.

translation.lb: Ech kann der et awer mat naischt besser beweisen, wi wann ech soen, du solls et selwer probi'eren.
translation.en: I can prove it to you no better than by saying you should try it yourself.

translation.lb: Mat all dem aneren wats du schreiws sen ech natîrlech averstanen.
translation.en: With everything else you write, I naturally agree.

translation.lb: Nu geff dich drun, ech lauschteren.
translation.en: Now go ahead, I'm listening.

translation.lb: De Lauschterer
translation.en: The Listener

translation.lb: Nach bass du stärk an hârd.
translation.en: Still, you are strong and tough.

translation.lb: nach bass du brutal, an o'ni Erbârmen.
translation.en: Still, you are brutal and without mercy.

translation.lb: Awer et ass deng lescht, verzweifelt Krâft, de's du opdreiws fir eis nach eng ke'er ze kniechten an ze weisen dass du Méschter bass.
translation.en: But it is your last, desperate strength that you exert to subjugate us once more and show that you are master.

translation.lb: Awer mir spieren et, du muss trotzdém geschwen weichen, well deng Krâft ass âl a verbraucht, du be'sen hârden Wanter.
translation.en: But we can feel it, you must nevertheless soon yield, because your strength is old and spent, you harsh winter.

translation.lb: An net weit hannert dir stét dât le'wt jongt Frejo'er a sammelt all seng Energie a Krâft fir dech ze iwerrennen.
translation.en: And not far behind you stands spring, full of life, gathering all its energy and strength to overrun you.

translation.lb: Net me' läng dauert et, an du leis gebrach um Buedem.
translation.en: It will not take much longer and you will lie broken on the ground.

translation.lb: Da könnt de' frösch vergoldt Frejo'erssönnchen mat hirer jonker Krâft a Le'ft, den Himmel vertauscht sein ellent grôt Kléd ge'nt e wonnersche'nt hellblôt,
translation.en: Then comes the fresh golden spring sun with its youthful strength and life, the sky swaps its ugly gray clothes for a wonderful light blue.

translation.lb: all Bém a Gestreich laueren mat me'sam zereckgehâlener Krâft drop fir können auszesche'ssen, ze ble'en an ze liewen.
translation.en: All trees and shrubs lie in wait with restrained strength to be able to sprout, to bloom and to live.

translation.lb: An de Buedem ötemt erlichtert op, wann de' schwe'er Eis- a Schne'- decken vun him erôf ass, a seng jong Sôten erausspiesse können.
translation.en: And the ground breathes a sigh of relief when the heavy layers of ice and snow are gone from it, and its young shoots can sprout forth.

translation.lb: D'Villerchcr kommen nés zereck an erfréen eis Dâg an Nuecht mat hirem onermiddleche Liebesgezwitscher.
translation.en: The birds return again and delight us day and night with their tireless love chirping.

translation.lb: D'Frejo'ersönnchen zaubert an d'jong Hierzer en onroegt Klappen, Wârden, Hoffen a Verlängeren.
translation.en: The springtime sun conjures an uneasy beating, waiting, hoping, and longing in young hearts.

translation.lb: A verzweifelt Hierzer lét se e klengen Hoffnongsstrâhl, dén ömmer me' gro'ss a stärk, an ebémol e fest vertrauende Glaw ass.
translation.en: And in desperate hearts, it allows a small ray of hope, which grows larger and stronger, and suddenly becomes a firm trusting faith.

translation.lb: An an der Friemd kucke verzweifelt, Hemechtskanner net me' eso' onglecklech an tro'schtlos no hém.
translation.en: And in foreign lands, the eyes of desperate, expatriate children are not so miserable and desolate.

translation.lb: Och bei hinne get et Frejo'er, den Himmel get blö, d'Blummen ble'en an d'jong Sonn wiermt hir onro'eg Hierzer a get hinne frösche Mut a Krâft.
translation.en: Spring also comes to them, the sky turns blue, the flowers bloom, and the youthful sun warms their restless hearts and gives them fresh courage and strength.

translation.lb: Sie hoffen dass elo alles besser get an dass sie geschwenn an hir onvergiesslech Hemecht zereckkommen.
translation.en: They hope that now everything will get better and that they will soon return to their unforgettable homeland.

translation.lb: Duerfir le'wt Frejo'er, komm se'er, an hél mat denger Krâft a Le'wt all Wonnen, de' de be'se Wanter geschloen huet.
translation.en: Therefore live, spring, come quickly, and heal with your strength and life all the wounds dealt by the harsh winter.

translation.lb: Komm a wierm ail kâl, verzweifelt Hierzer, a gef hinnen neie Mut a Liewensfréd!
translation.en: Come and warm all cold, desperate hearts, and give them new courage and joy in living!
